T02D2529:188a-1: badzra dh'a tu mah'a mandala la lo pi ka sarba badzrod ya n'a ma pind'artha /
T02D2529:188a-3: rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga
T02D2529:188a-4: rdo rje thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i don
T02D2529:188a-5: bsdus pa / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2529:188a-6: rang gi lus ngag yid dag rnam dag pas //
T02D2529:188a-7: bdud kyi 'tshe ba go skabs med mdzad cing //
T02D2529:188a-8: bsod nams tshogs dang de bzhin ye shes te //
T02D2529:188a-9: de gnyis rab rdzogs rgyu dngos 'gro phan mdzad//
T02D2529:188a-10: skye ba gcig gis thogs dang srid mtha' ba //
T02D2529:188a-11: legs 'gro de nas rang gi sems rtogs pa //
T02D2529:188a-12: sngon 'gro mngon par byang chub rim bzang pos //
T02D2529:188a-13: chos rgyal nyid brnyes byams pa la sogs phyir //
T02D2529:188a-14: dkyil 'khor sprul la mdzad phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor pa //
T02D2529:188a-15: rang gi rnam par thar pas yang dag par //
T02D2529:188a-16: 'gro ba gdul phyir bsdus shing las la bzhag / rnam par khyab pa bsdus pas rnam 'phrul bstan //
T02D2529:188a-17: de nas 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan mi rnams la //
T02D2529:188a-18: phan phyir ji bzhin cho ga bzang po yis //
T02D2529:188a-19: tshon gyi dkyil 'khor skyon med ston mdzad pa //
T02D2529:188b-0: bdag dang gzhan don @188b phun sum gnas brnyes pa //
T02D2529:188b-1: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' rnam 'dren pa //
T02D2529:188b-2: rnal 'byor rgyud kyi dbang phyug bdag phyag 'tshal //
T02D2529:188b-3: 'di ni go rims nges ba tsam //
T02D2529:188b-4: gtso bor bya la gzhol ba yis //
T02D2529:188b-6: don bsdus bdag nyid dran phyir bri ;
T02D2529:188b-7: / gang du rnam par rmongs pa'i gnas //
T02D2529:188b-8: der ni tshig don 'ga' zhig brjod //
T02D2529:188b-9: gzhan du blo gros ngan pa rnams //
T02D2529:188b-10: sgra tsam la yang log par rtogs //
T02D2529:188b-11: deng sang sngags kyi theg pa mchog / yi ge'i don gyis rnam dkrugs shing //
T02D2529:188b-12: bla ma gcig nas gcig 'ongs pa'i //
T02D2529:188b-13: man ngag rim la gus dang bral //
T02D2529:188b-14: de phyir bla ma'i man ngag gis //
T02D2529:188b-15: 'di yi snying po cung zad bri //
T02D2529:188b-16: 'dir slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas //
T02D2529:188b-17: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi lugs kyis slob ma dbang bskur te /
T02D2529:188b-18: tshe 'di nyid la dga' ba dang bde ba'i mchog
T02D2529:188b-19: gi mthar thug pa 'thob pa la sogs pa'i dgos
T02D2529:188b-20: pa gzigs nas / dkyil 'khor chog rgyas pa bsdu ba bzhed pas //
T02D2529:188b-21: phyag 'tshal dngos po thams cad kyis //
T02D2529:188b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher smos pa mdzad do //
T02D2529:188b-23: de la 'dir ci'i phyir phyag btsal zhe na /
T02D2529:188b-24: bdag nyid dam pa'i spyod pa can du bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2529:188b-25: 'di'i bsgrub par bya ba dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2529:188b-26: la dang ba ni legs pa thams cad thob pa'i
T02D2529:188b-27: rgyu yin pas gzhan de la dang ba bskyed pa'i
T02D2529:188b-28: phyir dang / bgegs zhi bar bya ba'i yang phyir ro //
T02D2529:188b-29: de la phyag 'tshal ba ni 'dud pa ste skad kyi byings las de skad du bstan pas so //
T02D2529:188b-30: rab kyi sgra ni mchog tu gyur pa ste de
T02D2529:188b-31: yang lus dang ngag dang yid thams cad kyis gus
T02D2529:188b-32: pa nye bar gnas pas so //
T02D2529:188b-33: de'i phyir dngos po thams cad kyis zhes pa ste /
T02D2529:188b-34: lus ngag yid thams cad kyis so //
T02D2529:188b-35: gzhan dag 'dir rigs spyi dang khyad par gyi phyag
T02D2529:188b-36: 'tshal ba lnga ni dngos po thams cad kyis zhes
T02D2529:188b-37: zer na / 'di slob dpon gyis de kho na
T02D2529:188b-38: ltar mdzad ces grub par mi nus pas btags pa
T02D2529:188b-40: su zhig la phyag 'tshal zhe na /
T02D2529:188b-41: rdor sems khyab bdag chen po la //
T02D2529:188b-43: rdo rje zab mo'i cha brjod pa ste /
T02D2529:189a-1: bskal pa grangs med pa de snyed du spros pa'i tshogs bor te shin tu brtan ba dang /
T02D2529:189a-2: 'phel 'grib med par byas pa'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni rdo rje ste /
T02D2529:189a-3: dang po'i bye brag ma lus pa 'gegs pas nor
T02D2529:189a-4: bu rin po che rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir
T02D2529:189a-6: bskal ba du mar rab goms byas pa yi //
T02D2529:189a-7: rgyu dang rigs pa'i tshul dang sa la mkhas //
T02D2529:189a-8: gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer rnam 'jig pa //
T02D2529:189a-9: ye shes rdo rje brtan de 'phags bdag stsol //
T02D2529:189a-11: de yang glo bur ba'i dri ma rnams bsal ba kho nar zad kyi /
T02D2529:189a-12: rang ngo bo nyid thog ma nas rdo rje lta bu mi phyed pas na /
T02D2529:189a-13: rab tu brtan zhing dus gsum mi 'gyur bar gnas pas sems dpa' ste /
T02D2529:189a-14: sems dpa' sngon dang tha ma med //
T02D2529:189a-15: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02D2529:189a-17: gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha //
T02D2529:189a-19: de ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir //
T02D2529:189a-20: 'di ni sems can gyi gnas skabs na yang brtan pa /
T02D2529:189a-21: sems can kun gyi sems gang yin //
T02D2529:189a-22: rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa ste //
T02D2529:189a-23: brtan pa'i phyir na dpa' zhes brjod //
T02D2529:189a-25: de nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ngo bo
T02D2529:189a-26: sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang de las lhag par
T02D2529:189a-28: rnam pa kun mkhyen ye shes ni //
T02D2529:189a-29: de 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02D2529:189a-30: brtan pa'i phyir na dpa' zhes bya //
T02D2529:189a-32: de ltar na 'di ni chos kyi sku'i ngo bo can te /
T02D2529:189a-33: bsgribs pa dang ma bsgribs pa'i dus dag tu yang rang gi bdag nyid la 'bri ba dang /
T02D2529:189a-34: 'phel ba spangs par mi 'gyur ba ni /
T02D2529:189a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste /
T02D2529:189a-36: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid de /
T02D2529:189a-37: de bzhin du gnas pa'o zhes gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02D2529:189a-38: de ltar chos kyi sku'i dbang las gzugs kyi sku
T02D2529:189a-39: dpe med pa 'byung ba ni rgya che ba ste
T02D2529:189a-41: gnyis med rang bzhin med par thugs chung nas //
T02D2529:189a-42: gzugs sku bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis //
T02D2529:189a-43: 'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston par mdzad //
T02D2529:189b-1: de ltar de lta bur thams cad du khyab pa ni khyab bdag ste /
T02D2529:189b-2: brtan pa dang g-yo ba thams cad du snang ba ston pas shin tu rgya cher gyur to //
T02D2529:189b-3: de ltar zab pa dang rgya che ba 'di ni ji skad du /
T02D2529:189b-4: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las /
T02D2529:189b-6: zhes gsungs pas gsal por mdzad do //
T02D2529:189b-7: de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu
T02D2529:189b-8: pa'i bkod pas kyang bsgrun du med pas na chen
T02D2529:189b-9: po'i sgra yis bstan pa ste /
T02D2529:189b-12: rgyu dag che bas na 'di chen po yang yin
T02D2529:189b-13: la khyab bdag kyang yin pas na chen pos khyab
T02D2529:189b-14: bdag go // de ltar zab pa dang rgya che
T02D2529:189b-15: ba'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la
T02D2529:189b-16: phyag 'tshal nas nga 'dir ci zhig byed ce na
T02D2529:189b-17: bdag go // / dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad bya ste //
T02D2529:189b-18: rdo rje thams cad 'byung dge ba //
T02D2529:189b-20: 'di ni 'dir rtogs pa dang ldan pa dag 'jug
T02D2529:189b-21: pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa dgos pa dang thabs
T02D2529:189b-22: phul du byung ba dag bstan te /
T02D2529:189b-23: re zhig dang po nyid du 'di la brjod par bya ba khyad par can med de /
T02D2529:189b-24: smyon pa'i tshig las dur khrod dang ri rtse nyams
T02D2529:189b-25: mi dga' bar yul gyi bzang mo dang phrad pa
T02D2529:189b-26: med pa lta bu'o snyam du sems pa dgag pa'i
T02D2529:189b-27: phyir / dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad bya ste //
T02D2529:189b-29: 'di na sngags kyi theg pa 'di las dkyil 'khor
T02D2529:189b-30: ni rab tu grags pas khyab pa'i dngos po'i stobs
T02D2529:189b-31: goms shing skyes bu'i 'dod pa tsam gyis ma phye
T02D2529:189b-32: pa yin la / de dang mthun pa'i brjod pa dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o /
T02D2529:189b-33: zhes dam bca' ba ni snying la babs pas na
T02D2529:189b-34: smyon pa'i tshig las 'phags pas na 'di la brjod
T02D2529:189b-35: par bya ba yod dam zhes rtog par 'gyur gyi
T02D2529:189b-36: 'di ni mi 'tsham pa'i dag go zhes ldog pa'i
T02D2529:189b-37: yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:189b-38: 'dir brjod par bya ba de yang gang zhig yin /
T02D2529:189b-39: dkyil 'khor ni 'di na rab tu mang ste 'di
T02D2529:189b-40: las phyi rol du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor yang yod
T02D2529:189b-41: la / de ni sngags kyi rgyud las bkag ste /
T02D2529:189b-42: kha cig gzhan gyi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pas /
T02D2529:190a-0: ngan song gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa de dag ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs @190a * //
T02D2529:190a-2: / yang 'di na bya ba'i rgyud las rab tu
T02D2529:190a-3: sdug bsngal ba'i dka' thub brtan par bya ba'i dkyil
T02D2529:190a-4: 'khor yod la / de yang 'dod par bya ba
T02D2529:190a-5: ma yin te rnam par g-yeng bas nang gi rnal
T02D2529:190a-6: 'byor dang 'gal zhing gcig tu sdug bsngal bas na
T02D2529:190a-7: 'khor yod la / mi 'dod la ; de yang dpal mchog dang po las bkag ste /
T02D2529:190a-8: dka' thub spyad pa mi bzod pas //
T02D2529:190a-9: sems g-yengs gyur nas ma grub po //
T02D2529:190a-10: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bstan pas so //
T02D2529:190a-11: de bzhin du 'di na kha cig de bzhin gshegs
T02D2529:190a-12: pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa khong du ma chud pas
T02D2529:190a-13: bud med bsten pa la sogs pa sgra ji bzhin
T02D2529:190a-14: par 'dzin cing bud med bsten pa'i dkyil 'khor dag
T02D2529:190a-15: yod la / de yang 'dod pa ma yin te /
T02D2529:190a-16: rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i rgyud las ring du spang pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:190a-17: de nas 'di la brjod par bya ba yod kyang
T02D2529:190a-18: brjod par bya ba khyad par can ma yin ma
T02D2529:190a-19: zhes bzlog pa srid pas na de dgag pa'i phyir
T02D2529:190a-20: / rdo rje thams cad 'byung zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2529:190a-21: rdo rje dbyings nas ji srid rdo rje 'bebs pa'i
T02D2529:190a-22: bar du lha sum cu rtsa bdun snyed ni thams
T02D2529:190a-23: cad rdo rje'i ming gi mtshan pas na rdo rje
T02D2529:190a-24: ste / de rnams ma lus pa brjod pa ni thams cad de ;
T02D2529:190a-25: 'di thams cad kyang yin la rdo rje yang yin pas na thams cad rdo rje'o //
T02D2529:190a-26: de rnams kyi 'byung ba ni ji ltar bskyed pa dang byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2529:190a-28: bzlas brjod bya ba'i thabs kyis rim pa phyin ci
T02D2529:190a-29: ma log par 'byung bar byed ston par byed la
T02D2529:190a-30: gsal bar byed ces pa'i bar du ste /
T02D2529:190a-31: des ni the tshom las bzlog pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bas /
T02D2529:190a-32: thun mong ma yin pa'i dkyil 'khor nges par gzung bas 'jug tu rung bar byas so //
T02D2529:190a-33: de ltar bstan pas brjod par bya ba yod du
T02D2529:190a-34: zin kyang brjod par bya ba bstan pa'i gzhung 'di
T02D2529:190a-35: la don byed pa khyad par can ci yang med
T02D2529:190a-37: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis rtsa
T02D2529:190a-38: ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga bshad zin
T02D2529:190a-39: la / gdul bya chen po dag gis ni ri
T02D2529:190a-40: rab kyi rtse mor dkyil 'khor sprul ba mthong zin
T02D2529:190b-0: pas na de'i tshe @190b ga mi dgos so zhe
T02D2529:190b-1: la / na / de'i phyir sngar bshad bya ste /
T02D2529:190b-3: gdul bya chen po ngag lam yin yang //
T02D2529:190b-4: phyis 'byung ba'i skye bo phal la dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga dgos shing /
T02D2529:190b-5: de yang bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis zur
T02D2529:190b-6: tsam zhig bstan pas na blo gros chung ngu'i skye
T02D2529:190b-7: bo dag gis ga la rtogs /
T02D2529:190b-8: de bas na de ni ma bshad pa dang 'dra ste /
T02D2529:190b-9: don bya ba la mthu che ba ma yin pas so //
T02D2529:190b-10: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas 'dir de gsal zhing
T02D2529:190b-11: rdzogs par rnam par phye bas the tshom med par
T02D2529:190b-12: bya ste / des na dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
T02D2529:190b-13: bde blag tu rtogs par byas pa ni 'di rtsom
T02D2529:190b-15: 'di bya rog gi so brtag pa'i bstan bcos lta bu ma yin no //
T02D2529:190b-16: kha cig 'di la 'brel ba med par the tshom
T02D2529:190b-17: za bas brjod bya de 'dis brjod par byed dam
T02D2529:190b-18: ci ma yin zhes rtog pa srid na 'di ma
T02D2529:190b-20: gang zhig gang med na mi 'byung la gang yod
T02D2529:190b-21: na 'byung ba de ni rgyu dang 'bras bur 'khrul
T02D2529:190b-22: pa med cing 'di las gzhan gyi ji ltar yang
T02D2529:190b-23: rdo rje thams cad bstan pa 'byung ba gsal por
T02D2529:190b-25: 'di las ni nges bar de 'byung bas 'di dag thabs dang /
T02D2529:190b-26: de las byung bar nges pas de nyid las byung ba'i 'brel ba'o //
T02D2529:190b-27: de na 'jog po'i gtsug gi nor bu blang ba'i
T02D2529:190b-28: yon tan gyi snyan dngags ltar 'di nus pa med
T02D2529:190b-29: pa'i ngo bo ma yin no //
T02D2529:190b-30: de'i mtshan nyid khong du chud pas kyang ci zhig bya /
T02D2529:190b-31: ma bag mar blang ba'i rim pa'i man ngag la
T02D2529:190b-32: brjod par bya ba dang dgos pa dang 'brel ba
T02D2529:190b-33: yod kyang de 'dod par bya ba ma yin no
T02D2529:190b-34: zhe na / de bsal ba'i phyir dge ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2529:190b-35: 'dir de dag gi mtshan nyid bde blag tu rtogs
T02D2529:190b-36: nas 'jug par byed pa ni thun mong dang khyad
T02D2529:190b-37: par gyi dngos grub rnams thob pas dge zhing don
T02D2529:190b-38: yod par 'gyur te de mi 'chad par 'gyur ba
T02D2529:190b-39: las / rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog / dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa /
T02D2529:190b-41: de bas na 'di na 'di mngon par mtho ba
T02D2529:190b-42: dang legs pa thams cad 'byung bas nas dgos pa'i
T02D2529:190b-44: de ltar don mtha' dag la the tshom bskyed pa ni 'jug pa'i yan lag ste /
T02D2529:191a-0: 'di mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can don med par the tshom @191a * //
T02D2529:191a-1: bskyed pa ni zlog par byed de /
T02D2529:191a-2: dug tu the tshom za ba la ni longs spyod pa las ldog la /
T02D2529:191a-3: zhing pa la sogs pa don yod par the tshom za ba ni 'jug par byed de /
T02D2529:191a-4: dngos po'i stobs kyis zhugs pa 'di de kho na
T02D2529:191a-5: ltar bya ba byas par 'gyur gyi mi bya ba
T02D2529:191a-8: de ltar 'di la rtog pa dang ldan pa dag
T02D2529:191a-9: 'jug pa'i yan lag tu gyur ba'i brjod par bya
T02D2529:191a-12: dgos pa'i dgos pa dag brjod cing mthar thug pa'i
T02D2529:191a-13: go 'phang bsgrub par bya ba dgos pa'i dgos par
T02D2529:191a-14: rtog pa yang zur gyis bstan nas /
T02D2529:191a-16: dkyil 'khor cho ga bshad bya ste /
T02D2529:191a-17: zhes bya ba las glengs te dkyil 'khor ni ji lta bu /
T02D2529:191a-18: de ji snyed cig ci'i phyir de skad ces bya zhes bya ba bsam pa dang /
T02D2529:191a-19: cho ga ni ji lta bu cho ga'i sgra gang don gang zhes pa 'dir brjod de /
T02D2529:191a-20: gzhung 'di'i brjod par bya ba ni 'di tsam du zad do ;
T02D2529:191a-21: / de la 'di'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni
T02D2529:191a-22: rnam par mi rtog pa'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings
T02D2529:191a-23: te de ni snying por gyur pas so //
T02D2529:191a-25: yan lag kun las rnam grol zhing //
T02D2529:191a-26: dbyangs dang yi ge rnam bral ba //
T02D2529:191a-28: 'di ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D2529:191a-29: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings de ji lta bar
T02D2529:191a-30: rtog pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyang
T02D2529:191a-31: dkyil 'khor te / 'di lta bu yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T02D2529:191a-32: sangs rgyas kun gyis byang chub sems //
T02D2529:191a-33: bla na med pa rtogs gyur pa//
T02D2529:191a-34: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i ye shes gang //
T02D2529:191a-35: de ni dkyil 'khor snying por gsungs //
T02D2529:191a-37: de bzhin du sngon gyi smon lam dang tshogs kyi
T02D2529:191a-38: mthus yul dang dus dang der de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2529:191a-39: rnams kyis gzugs kyi sku'i bkod pa dpe med pa
T02D2529:191a-41: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bya ba gsungs pas so //
T02D2529:191a-42: de nyid ni sbrul pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
T02D2529:191a-43: gdul bya'i ngor nges pa med par sna tshogs pa'i sbrul pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:191a-44: 'di la rnam par smin pa'ang med pa ma yin te /
T02D2529:191b-0: yun ring du shin tu goms @191b par byas pa las byung ba'i phyir te /
T02D2529:191b-1: rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs de dang de rnam par spangs pas brnyes pa'o //
T02D2529:191b-2: 'on kyang 'di ni rtog pa'i lam du gyur pa bkod la /
T02D2529:191b-3: sna tshogs par snang ba ni mos pas sbrul pa'i dkyil 'khor gcig kyang sna tshogs par brjod do //
T02D2529:191b-4: de ltar dkyil 'khor de dag ni 'bras bu'i ngo
T02D2529:191b-5: bor grub pas 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor zhes rnal 'byor
T02D2529:191b-6: gyi rgyud kyi lugs kyis bsnan to //
T02D2529:191b-7: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa'i sems dang sems las
T02D2529:191b-8: byung ba tha mal pa'i rnam par rtog pa las
T02D2529:191b-9: grol ba ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par can 'di
T02D2529:191b-10: lta ste / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs
T02D2529:191b-11: kyi sku dang rab tu 'dra bar bsgom pa'i dkyil
T02D2529:191b-12: 'khor 'di ni ji lta bar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2529:191b-13: lta ste / zhes bya ste / rnam pa 'dra bar mos pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2529:191b-14: de'i 'bras bu la rgyu de ji lta bar sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:191b-15: gang du sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran
T02D2529:191b-16: pa'i rten gyur pa dang rnam pa 'dra ba'ang rung
T02D2529:191b-17: ste / rdul tshon dang bris skur byas pa la
T02D2529:191b-18: sogs pa yang ji lta bar sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2529:191b-19: ste / zhes bya'o // de bzhin du rnal 'byor
T02D2529:191b-20: pa rnams kyis tha mal pa'i gnas skabs kyi chos
T02D2529:191b-21: kyi dbyings dag pa ma yin pa dang /
T02D2529:191b-22: bdag med pa gnyis la gzhol ba'i shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin yang dkyil 'khor zhes bya ste /
T02D2529:191b-23: 'bras bu nye bar brtags pa las gnod pa med pas so //
T02D2529:191b-24: de ltar de dag ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D2529:191b-25: 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor thob pa'i thabs kyi dngos po'i
T02D2529:191b-27: ji skad du dkyil ni snying po'o //
T02D2529:191b-28: 'khor ni len pa'o zhes rnam par snang mdzad mngon
T02D2529:191b-29: par byang chub pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa bzhin no
T02D2529:191b-30: // de ltar de dag ni rgyud bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor du brjod do //
T02D2529:191b-31: de ltar byas na dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sa dang /
T02D2529:191b-32: de'i rgyu rigs dang lam gyi bdag nyid 'di tsam zhig la bya'o //
T02D2529:191b-33: de'i rnam par dbye ba yang ji ltar bstan pa'i phyogs las rnam pa bdun te /
T02D2529:191b-34: rgyas par dbye ba la ni tshad med do //
T02D2529:191b-35: de'i ming gi don kyang snying po 'dzin par byed pa zhes bye brag med par byas te /
T02D2529:192a-1: na 'bras bu ni de'i rang bzhin 'dzin pas snying po nyid 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'am /
T02D2529:192a-2: snying po yang yin la 'dzin pa yang yin pas snying po 'dzin pa zhes bsdu'o //
T02D2529:192a-3: rgyu ni snying po'i phyir 'dzin pa'am /
T02D2529:192a-4: snying po la len pa zhes bsdu'o //
T02D2529:192a-5: de ltar na 'dir 'bras bu'i dkyil 'khor ni thabs las byung ba yin la /
T02D2529:192a-6: rgyu'i bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni de thob pa'i
T02D2529:192a-7: thabs phul du byung ba yin pas 'di dag thabs
T02D2529:192a-8: dang thabs las byung ba'i 'brel ba khyad par can
T02D2529:192a-10: 'bras bus kyang 'gro ba mtha' dag la ji srid
T02D2529:192a-11: nam mkha' la gnas pa de srid du phan pa
T02D2529:192a-12: dang bde ba sgrub pas 'di'i 'bras bu'i 'bras bu
T02D2529:192a-13: ste / rgyu yi rjes la bdag po'i yul bdag nyid //
T02D2529:192a-14: 'bras bu'i stobs kyis dgra las rnam par rgyal //
T02D2529:192a-16: gzhan don phun tshogs sangs rgyas kyi //
T02D2529:192a-18: sangs rgyas nyid sogs de las gzhan //
T02D2529:192a-21: de lta bas na gzhung 'di'i brjod par bya ba dkyil 'khor yin la /
T02D2529:192a-22: dkyil 'khor de yang rgyu dang 'bras bus sems can
T02D2529:192a-23: gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i don
T02D2529:192a-24: du 'gyur bas 'di don chen por nye bar gnas
T02D2529:192a-25: pa'i phyir 'bad pas bshad par rigs so zhes bya
T02D2529:192a-26: ba ni lam dang 'bras bu'i go rims so //
T02D2529:192a-27: de khong du chud par byed pa'i rim pa'i gzhung ni 'dir cho ga zhes bya ste /
T02D2529:192a-28: nye bar khrid pas na thabs yin la /
T02D2529:192a-29: thabs 'di yang de la yod pas na thabs can te /
T02D2529:192a-30: dkyil 'khor gyi don mtha' dag khong du chud par
T02D2529:192a-31: byed pa la blo 'khrid pa'i thabs zab mo dang
T02D2529:192a-32: bcas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2529:192a-33: 'on kyang 'dir dkyil 'khor mtha' dag ma bstan pas
T02D2529:192a-34: na gtso bor ni rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2529:192a-35: cho ga gzung la gzhan dag gi cho ga yang
T02D2529:192a-37: da ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas dkyil 'khor
T02D2529:192a-38: gyi cho ga bsdu bar bya ba la su zhig
T02D2529:192a-39: snod du gyur pa yin pa de bstan pa'i phyir
T02D2529:192a-40: / de la dam tshig la sogs pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i phyir /
T02D2529:192a-41: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud chen
T02D2529:192a-42: po'i cho gas dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga kun las
T02D2529:192b-0: btu bar bya'o @192b zhes smos te /
T02D2529:192b-1: gzhan du na cho ga mi 'grub ces dgongs la /
T02D2529:192b-2: kho bo cho ga kun las btus pa tsam pa yang don med ces dgongs pa'o //
T02D2529:192b-3: 'dir dam tshig la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni dbang bskur bar bsdu'o //
T02D2529:192b-4: 'di na dam tshig la sogs pa thob pa de
T02D2529:192b-5: dag nyid kyis dngos grub kyi phyir bsnyen pa byed
T02D2529:192b-6: pa yang rung / slob ma mngon par dbang bskur ba'i phyir bsnyen pa'ang rung ste /
T02D2529:192b-7: bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i cho ga ni ji
T02D2529:192b-8: lta bu slob ma dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni
T02D2529:192b-9: ji lta bu zhes rtog pa la /
T02D2529:192b-10: dang po bsnyen pa'i cho ga gsungs pas de'i go rims brjod de /
T02D2529:192b-11: 'di na thog ma med pa'i dus nas byas pa'i
T02D2529:192b-12: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi spyod pa phyag rgya
T02D2529:192b-13: dang gsang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa la
T02D2529:192b-14: bar du gcod pa'i sgrib pa bsal ba'i phyir /
T02D2529:192b-15: dang por re zhig bdag med pa la lhag par
T02D2529:192b-16: mos pas nang bdag nyid can gyi khrus byas la
T02D2529:192b-17: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lus ngag yid gsum
T02D2529:192b-20: ces bya ba la sogs pa'i theg pa chen po
T02D2529:192b-21: 'dir sems gtso bor gyur pas de sbyang ba sngar
T02D2529:192b-22: bstan cing / ngag gi nyes pa ni sgrub sla

T02D2529:192b-24: bstan cing / dang / 'dir bzlas brjod las gtso
T02D2529:192b-25: bor dngos grub kyi mtshan ma 'dod pa'i dbang du
T02D2529:192b-26: byas pa'i phyir de'i 'og tu ngag sbyang bar bstan
T02D2529:192b-27: bstan cing / dang / to // mtshan nyid de
T02D2529:192b-28: gnyis las bzlog pa ni lus yin pas thams cad
T02D2529:192b-29: bstan cing / dang / to // kyi mjug tu'o
T02D2529:192b-30: // lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2529:192b-31: sgrub pa po la bdud kyis glags su gyur pa
T02D2529:192b-32: spang ba'i phyir bsrung ba'i bya ba ni /
T02D2529:192b-33: de nas yi ge h'um las rdo rje 'bar ba
T02D2529:192b-34: nyi ma'i me lta bur bdag nyid sprul te zhes
T02D2529:192b-35: bya ba la sogs pa ji srid badzra bandha bam
T02D2529:192b-36: zhes pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du smos pa'o //
T02D2529:192b-37: skabs 'di la bsam par bya ba 'ga' yod de /
T02D2529:192b-38: cis na bsrung ba'i cho ga gzhan ston par byed /
T02D2529:192b-39: rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid las ni /
T02D2529:192b-40: rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig / dran nam nyan par byed kyang rung //
T02D2529:192b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pas rigs so so'i bsrung ba ma yin nam /
T02D2529:192b-42: de lta bu rang gi cho ga nges pa bor
T02D2529:192b-43: na gzhan ston 'di ni mi 'tsham mo zhe na
T02D2529:193a-2: 'di na gang zag gnyis te rang gi bya ba
T02D2529:193a-3: tsam sems shing mchog tu mnyam par gzhag pa nang
T02D2529:193a-4: gi bdag nyid la lhag par gzhol ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D2529:193a-5: pa dang / de las gzhan pa dkyil 'khor chen
T02D2529:193a-6: po spros pa la zhugs pas slob ma'i don byed
T02D2529:193a-7: pa dang / pa'o // de la dang po'i dbang
T02D2529:193a-8: du byas nas ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las nang gi
T02D2529:193a-9: byed pa'i bsrung ba tshegs med pa bstan te /
T02D2529:193a-10: de ni ches gdams pas de tsam gyis bsrung bar 'gyur la /
T02D2529:193a-11: 'di ni gtso cher dkyil 'khor chen po'i spros pa
T02D2529:193a-12: la zhugs pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyi nang du
T02D2529:193a-13: byas pas nang dang phyi rol gyi bgegs ldang ba
T02D2529:193a-15: sngags dang phyag rgya mchog tu mi zad pa drag
T02D2529:193a-16: cing rno ba dag gis bsrung ba chen po bya
T02D2529:193a-17: dgos pas nyes pa med do //
T02D2529:193a-18: yang na bsrung ba 'di lta bu yang yod ces rnam grangs la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir te /
T02D2529:193a-19: rang gi rgyud kyis bsrung ba yang sun mi 'byin pas so //
T02D2529:193a-20: gzhan dag na re bdag bsrung ba bsgom pa 'di'i
T02D2529:193a-21: nang du mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du
T02D2529:193a-22: 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes dam bcas pa la gnas
T02D2529:193a-23: pa'i bsrung ba ni dang po ste 'di'o //
T02D2529:193a-24: phyis thun mtshams dag la ni nang gi bsrung ba tsam zhes zer na 'di ni ma yin te ;
T02D2529:193a-25: bsrung ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgya che bar gyur pas 'gro ba bgegs ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:193a-26: 'dir su yi bsrung ba ji ltar bsrung dgos pa gang zhig mthong zhe na /
T02D2529:193a-27: rdo rje 'bar ba nyi ma'i me lta bur bdag
T02D2529:193a-28: nyid sprul te zhes bya ba ni bsrung ba po
T02D2529:193a-29: ste / nyi ma'i me ni mes 'jig pa'i dus
T02D2529:193a-30: kyi nyi ma bdun shar bas thams cad me'i phung
T02D2529:193a-31: por 'bar bar gyur pa ste de dang 'dra ba'o
T02D2529:193a-32: ste / // tshig phyi ma 'di kho nas rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba 'di bstan te /
T02D2529:193a-35: 'di'i mtshan nyid ni 'phags pa ngan song thams cad sbyong ba'i rgyud las gsungs so //
T02D2529:193a-36: khyad par du na yi ge h'um las byung ba dang dbang bskur zhing cho ga byas la /
T02D2529:193a-37: rang gi sngags zlos pas bgegs gzhom mo //
T02D2529:193a-38: de la dbang bskur ba ni khro bo ti r'inti
T02D2529:193a-39: ri'i zhes bya ba rdo rje 'bar ba nyi ma'i
T02D2529:193a-40: me lta bu nyid de de nyid kyi phyag rgyas
T02D2529:193b-1: de nas de la rdo rje phyed ma'i 'dug stangs kyis 'dug ste /
T02D2529:193b-2: rdo rje ti r'inti ri'i bcings la rdo rje phreng
T02D2529:193b-3: ba'i dbang bskur ba blang ngo zhes bya ba ni
T02D2529:193b-4: rdo rje phyed ma'i 'dug stangs te rdo rje skyil
T02D2529:193b-6: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba ni rgyud phyi
T02D2529:193b-7: ma las rigs so so'i dbang bskur ba bstan pa
T02D2529:193b-8: las / rdo rje rigs la rdo rje phreng ba
T02D2529:193b-9: mgo la bcings pas dbang bskur bar gsungs pas na
T02D2529:193b-11: khro bo 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs su byung bas so //
T02D2529:193b-12: gzhan dag khro bo ti r'inti ri zhes bya ba
T02D2529:193b-13: rdo rje 'bar ba las gzhan du 'dod pa de
T02D2529:193b-14: mi 'thad de / aom badzra dzv'a la aa na
T02D2529:193b-15: l'arka h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am zhes bya ba'i sngags
T02D2529:193b-16: 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa'i ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas
T02D2529:193b-17: dbang bskur ba na phyag rgya dang sngags tha dad
T02D2529:193b-18: pa phan tshun gyi byin gyis rlob par mi 'gyur
T02D2529:193b-19: ba'i nyes pa yod pa dang /
T02D2529:193b-20: 'phags pa ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong bar
T02D2529:193b-21: yang khro bo nyi ma'i me'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug
T02D2529:193b-22: pa na khro bo ti r'inti ri bcing zhes 'di
T02D2529:193b-24: de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gang du gang zhig gtso
T02D2529:193b-25: bor gyur pa de'i phyag rgyas 'jug par bstan pa'o
T02D2529:193b-26: // de la go cha bya ba ni aom tum
T02D2529:193b-27: zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyis go chas go
T02D2529:193b-28: cha byas la zhes bya ba ni 'chad par byas
T02D2529:193b-29: // la / de'i rjes la aom tum zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2529:193b-30: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis snying gar mdud pa bcing ba'i tshul gyis go cha bgo bar bya zhing /
T02D2529:193b-31: de bzhin du mgrin pa dang /
T02D2529:193b-38: dpral ba'i steng du mdud pa dar dpyangs bcing ba'i tshul du bya'o //
T02D2529:193b-39: sgeg pa dang bcas pas tha ma nas tsam la bkrol te /
T02D2529:193b-40: mthar mnyam pa'i thal mo dang /

T02D2529:193b-42: 'di ni rgyas par bya ba rnal 'byor gyi rgyud
T02D2529:193b-44: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor bas //
T02D2529:193b-45: ji lta'i tshul bzhin byed pa yis //
T02D2529:193b-46: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas //
T02D2529:193b-47: go cha bgo ba'i tshul du bya //
T02D2529:193b-48: spyi bo dang ni dpral bar gnyis //
T02D2529:194a-0: glo gnyis dang ni rgyab tu @194a * //
T02D2529:194a-2: / rdo rje phreng bas bcings pa dang //
T02D2529:194a-3: sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dang //
T02D2529:194a-4: ngar bcing thabs su bcings nas ni //
T02D2529:194a-5: 'gying dang bcas pa mtha' nas dgrol //
T02D2529:194a-6: dar dbyangs pa yi thabs byas na //
T02D2529:194a-7: thal mo brdab pas brtan par bya //
T02D2529:194a-8: 'di yis bsrung ba byas nas ni //
T02D2529:194a-9: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal dang 'dra //
T02D2529:194a-10: mi chod pa dang mi phyed pa'i //
T02D2529:194a-11: rdo rje'i sku ni rab tu 'grub //
T02D2529:194a-12: rims dang dug dang dbyig dug nad //
T02D2529:194a-13: mkha' 'gros gtses dang gdon rnams dang //
T02D2529:194a-14: yan lag ma rung byed pa kun //
T02D2529:194a-15: 'di yis bsrung na yong mi tshugs /
T02D2529:194a-16: dpal rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2529:194a-19: dbu rgyan bcing bas bcings pa ni //
T02D2529:194a-20: 'gying zhing mtha' nas dgrol bar bya //
T02D2529:194a-21: dar gyi mtha' ma 'phyang ba ltar //
T02D2529:194a-22: byas te thal mo brdab par bya //
T02D2529:194a-24: de ltar rnal 'byor khyad par can dbang bskur zhing cho ga dgos pa des bsrung ba bya'o //
T02D2529:194a-25: ji ltar bsrung ba bya zhe na //
T02D2529:194a-26: bya ba'i rgyud las khyad par du gyur pas bsrung ste /
T02D2529:194a-27: der ni mtshan ma la mngon par dga' bas bsrung ba thams cad rdzas la brten pa ste /
T02D2529:194a-28: las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags sam //
T02D2529:194a-29: yang na bgegs kyi dgras kyang rung //
T02D2529:194a-30: nges par yungs kar la sogs pas //
T02D2529:194a-31: dang por kun du bsal bar bya //
T02D2529:194a-33: 'dir ni nang gi rnal 'byor gyi mthu'i dbang las
T02D2529:194a-34: byung ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya tsam gyis 'grub pas
T02D2529:194a-35: rdzas de lta bu la mi ltos te /
T02D2529:194a-36: des na khro bo'i sngags dang phyag rgyas thog mar bgegs rab tu drag po dag la bsnun te /
T02D2529:194a-37: de yang rang gi lag gi rdo rjes brgyab cing bsad pa'o //
T02D2529:194a-38: bgegs bar ma rnams ni bsreg pa ste /
T02D2529:194a-39: rdo rje las me'i 'od 'phros pas tshig cing gdungs te byer bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:194a-40: bgegs rab tu phra mo mthu shin tu chung ba

T02D2529:194a-44: 'phros pas de dag bcing ba lngas bcings par bsam
T02D2529:194a-45: / mo // de ltar bgegs bskrad par byas nas /
T02D2529:194a-46: da ni phyogs bcing pa la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2529:194a-47: rdo rje bcing ba zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2529:194b-0: 'dir mdor bsdu na rdo rje @194b me la sogs
T02D2529:194b-1: pa nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi bar du sngags
T02D2529:194b-2: dang phyag rgya tha dad pa thams cad kyang rdo
T02D2529:194b-3: rje 'bar ba nyi ma'i me lta bu kho na'i
T02D2529:194b-4: rnal 'byor la gnas pas bya'i gzhan gyis ma yin
T02D2529:194b-5: te de ni bsrung ba'i phyir lhag par gnas pa

T02D2529:194b-8: par thar pa bsdus pa ni bcom ldan 'das 'di

T02D2529:194b-12: bya bas mtha' med pa'i spros pa 'byung bar 'gyur
T02D2529:194b-13: ro // de la thog mar ni 'og bcings te /
