T02D2529:194b-15: sa las bgegs 'byung ba mang bas na 'di ltar lha ma yin ma rung pa dang /
T02D2529:194b-17: sa bdag ma rungs pa dang /
T02D2529:194b-18: tha na rkang gis 'gro ba'i srin bu dag kyang
T02D2529:194b-19: 'og nas ldang bas gnod pa skyed pa de'i phyir
T02D2529:194b-23: steng gi bsrung ba gnyis ni lha'i gdon mthu chen po dag steng nas 'byung ba'i phyir te /
T02D2529:194b-24: steng nas mthu chen lha rnams so //
T02D2529:194b-25: zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T02D2529:194b-26: phyogs de na bdud sdig can gyi dpung gnas pas so ;
T02D2529:194b-27: / de bzhin du shar phyogs kyang lan gnyis su bcing ste /
T02D2529:194b-28: dri za rnams dang lha rnams phyogs de nas kyang dbang byed pas so //
T02D2529:194b-29: de nas nub bcing ba ni sprin dang ser ba
T02D2529:194b-30: dang char dag ches dkyil 'khor dang mi 'phrod la
T02D2529:194b-31: de dag klu rnams kyis byed pa yin la /
T02D2529:194b-32: klu rnams ni phal cher 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i nub
T02D2529:194b-33: phyogs kyi rgya mtsho klu'i grong khyer longs spyod ldan
T02D2529:194b-35: da ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas phyogs bcing
T02D2529:194b-36: ba'i cho ga de dag kho nas mtshams kyang bcing
T02D2529:194b-38: phyogs dang mtshams dang 'og dang steng gi bgegs tshar bcad pa byas la zhes smos te /
T02D2529:194b-39: shar phyogs bcing bas shar lho bcings la /
T02D2529:194b-40: nub phyogs bcing bas nub byang bcings te /
T02D2529:194b-41: de bzhin du lho bcing bas lho nub bcing zhing /
T02D2529:194b-42: byang bcing bas byang shar bcing zhes 'og tu yang sbyar te /
T02D2529:195a-0: dang po dang me lha dag lha'i rigs su @195a * //
T02D2529:195a-2: gshin rje dang srin po dag / las dang longs
T02D2529:195a-3: spyod 'dra zhing spyi dang bye brag tu gnas pa
T02D2529:195a-5: klu dang rlung lha dag las mthun pa la gnas
T02D2529:195a-6: te klu rnams kyis ser bu dang yul ngan pa
T02D2529:195a-7: dang ba mo dag byed pa ltar rlung lha yang
T02D2529:195a-9: gnod sbyin dang 'byung po dag rigs gcig pa dang
T02D2529:195a-10: las dang longs spyod dag 'dra ba'i phyir zhes bya
T02D2529:195a-12: de dag thams cad bgegs su gcig pa kho nas
T02D2529:195a-13: rtsa ba'i rgyud las bsrung ba re re zhig rigs
T02D2529:195a-14: re re la bstan par zad do //
T02D2529:195a-15: de bzhin du gtor ma 'dod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2529:195a-16: phyir gnod sbyin dag bar du gcod pa la brtson
T02D2529:195a-17: pas de ma thag tu byang bcing bas bcings pa
T02D2529:195a-18: ste / thams cad kyi mjug tu lho bcings pa
T02D2529:195a-19: ni gshin rje rnams chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i
T02D2529:195a-21: rdo rje slob dpon lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum
T02D2529:195a-22: tshogs pas 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa la bar
T02D2529:195a-23: du gcod pa la mi brtson pas /
T02D2529:195a-24: 'di dag gi gnod pa shin tu nye ba ma yin pas na tha mar bsrung ba'o //
T02D2529:195a-25: rdo rje las kyi dkyil 'khor bsrung ba byas la rab sbyin no zhes bya ba la /
T02D2529:195a-26: de la dkyil 'khor bcing ba ni ji ltar bya ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2529:195a-27: tsandan dmar pos byug ba yi //
T02D2529:195a-28: seng ldeng phur bu mdzub gang la //
T02D2529:195a-29: rnon por byas pa bzhi dag la //
T02D2529:195a-30: skud pa dmar po dag gis dkris //
T02D2529:195a-31: rdo rje phur bu brgyar bsngags te //
T02D2529:195a-32: gnas sam khyim dag tu yang rung //
T02D2529:195a-33: khu tshur gyis ni phyogs bzhir gdab //
T02D2529:195a-34: las kun byed pa'i rig sngags kyis //
T02D2529:195a-35: tshon sna lnga yi srad bu la //
T02D2529:195a-36: lan brgyar bsngags nas dang por der //
T02D2529:195a-37: phur bu rnams la bre bar bya //
T02D2529:195a-39: yang na rtse gcig sbom po la //
T02D2529:195a-40: rdo rje phur bu lan brgya ru //
T02D2529:195a-41: mngon par bsngags pa byas pa dag / lha yi gnas kyi phyi rol gyi //
T02D2529:195a-42: grva bzhir kun du gdab par bya //
T02D2529:195a-43: yang na dkyil 'khor phyi rol du //
T02D2529:195a-44: btab nas las rnams rab tu bya //
T02D2529:195a-45: rdo rje phur bu'i cho ga 'di //
T02D2529:195a-46: las kun byed par shes par bya //
T02D2529:195a-47: sgrub tshe 'di la bgegs med cing //
T02D2529:195a-48: sgrub pa po yis dngos grub 'thob /
T02D2529:195b-2: seng ldeng phur bu bzhi btsugs te //
T02D2529:195b-3: tshon skud kha dog sna lnga las //
T02D2529:195b-4: 'khor bar dam du bre bar bya //
T02D2529:195b-8: / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'dir ni de lta bu'i phyi rol gyi bya ba la mi ltos kyis /
T02D2529:195b-9: rdo rje las kyi sngags dang phyag rgya nyid kyis
T02D2529:195b-10: de dang 'dra bar bgegs kyis 'jug par dka' ba'i
T02D2529:195b-11: dkyil 'khor bcing ba byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2529:195b-12: rab sbyin par yang bya ba'i rgyud du ni /
T02D2529:195b-13: rdo rje ra bas sngags pa yis //
T02D2529:195b-14: lcags kyi phye mas rab tu bya //
T02D2529:195b-16: de nas cho ga 'di dag bya //
T02D2529:195b-17: so so'i phyogs kyi ri mo'i mtha' //
T02D2529:195b-18: rdo rje rtse gsum bya bar gsungs //
T02D2529:195b-19: dbus kyi ngos rnams dag tu yang //
T02D2529:195b-20: rdo rje bsgreng ba'i phreng ba bya //
T02D2529:195b-21: rdo rje ra ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D2529:195b-22: go cha de ni bya bar bstan //
T02D2529:195b-23: de yi dbus su bzhugs nas su //
T02D2529:195b-24: rdzas rnams rab tu bsgrub par bya //
T02D2529:195b-26: 'dir ni de yang snga ma bzhin du rdo rje
T02D2529:195b-27: las kyi sngags dang phyag rgya nyid kyis 'grub po
T02D2529:195b-28: // 'di'i phyag rgya ni 'og nas 'chad pas 'dir ma smos so //
T02D2529:195b-29: slar yang nang gi ra ba ste //
T02D2529:195b-30: zhes bya ba yang lcags kyi phye mas snga ma bzhin bya ba'i rgyud du'o //
T02D2529:195b-31: 'dir ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi //
T02D2529:195b-32: sngags dang phyag rgya nyid kyis so //
T02D2529:195b-33: 'o na ra ba dang nang gi ra ba la bye brag ci yod ce na /
T02D2529:195b-34: ra ba ni kun nas gru bzhi lham pa stong
T02D2529:195b-35: gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad dang mnyam pa gyur
T02D2529:195b-36: pa yin la / nang gi ra ba ni kun
T02D2529:195b-37: nas zlum po bcom pa dang dan pa'i 'jig rten
T02D2529:195b-38: gyi khams 'di'i tshad du gyur pa'o //
T02D2529:195b-39: ri mo la yang rab ni thig gru bzhir btag pa ji srid ma lus par bskor la /
T02D2529:195b-40: nang gi ra ba ni zlum por dkyil 'khor kho na bskor ba'o //
T02D2529:195b-41: 'o na slob dpon rab 'byor bskyangs kyi zhal snga
T02D2529:195b-42: nas rdo rje'i ra ba yang grva bzhir mdzad pa
T02D2529:195b-44: gang du de gru bzhir byas pa der ni bcom
T02D2529:195b-45: pa dang dan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i snying
T02D2529:195b-46: po ri rab kyi rtsa mo rnal 'byor gyi rgyud
T02D2529:196a-1: gtso bor mdzad pa dgongs par mdzad do //
T02D2529:196a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom pa dang 'jig
T02D2529:196a-3: rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par byang chub pa chen
T02D2529:196a-4: po brnyes nas / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
T02D2529:196a-5: khams 'dir mdzad pa rgyas pas 'dul ba'i zhing du
T02D2529:196a-6: mdzad pa ltar sngags pa'i dbang phyug gis kyang de
T02D2529:196a-7: de bzhin du spyad pa'i phyir rab dang nang gi
T02D2529:196a-8: ra ba gnyis kyi zhing byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2529:196a-9: rdo rje'i dra ba sbyin no zhes bya ba la /
T02D2529:196a-10: de yang bya ba'i rgyud las ni //
T02D2529:196a-11: rdo rje'i dra ba gsang sngags kyis //
T02D2529:196a-12: lan brgyar bsngags pa'i phye ma las //
T02D2529:196a-13: rdo rje'i phreng bas 'khor yug tu //
T02D2529:196a-14: bris na rdo rje'i dra bar 'gyur //
T02D2529:196a-16: cho ga 'di yi phyi nang du //
T02D2529:196a-17: rdo rje lta bu'i dra ba dang //
T02D2529:196a-18: rdo rje dra ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D2529:196a-19: shin tu thub par dka' bar 'gyur //
T02D2529:196a-21: phyi nang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i dra ba phyi'i rdo rje ra ba'i phyi rol kho na yin /
T02D2529:196a-22: nang gi dra ba ni thig zlum pos bskor ba'i
T02D2529:196a-23: me'i 'od kyi phreng ba'i nang du'o zhes bya ba
T02D2529:196a-25: de lta bur yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'dir ni
T02D2529:196a-26: sngags dang phyag rgyas 'grub pas phyi rol gyi bya
T02D2529:196a-28: rdo rje bcing ba ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ste /
T02D2529:196a-29: phyag rgya yang de'i las kyi phyag rgya 'og nas ston to //
T02D2529:196a-30: gzhan dag ni ye shes dbab pa'i dus kyi rdo rje bcing bar 'dod /
T02D2529:196a-31: de la dra ba ni ra ba dang 'tsham par steng g-yogs kyi rdo rje gzeb bri'o //
T02D2529:196a-33: bskrad pa dang ni 'og bcing dang //
T02D2529:196a-34: steng yang bcing zhing 'khor yug tu //
T02D2529:196a-35: mtshams bcad phyogs kyang bcing bya zhing //
T02D2529:196a-36: rdo rje rab dra ba bya //
T02D2529:196a-37: rgyud dang slob dpon lung dag gis //
T02D2529:196a-38: bdag dang rdzas dang lha yang bsrung //
T02D2529:196a-39: gsang sngags dag gis phyi nang du //
T02D2529:196a-40: bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog par bya //
T02D2529:196a-41: zhes bya ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa 'dir nang gi bya ba tsam gyis bsgrubs pa'o //
T02D2529:196a-43: srung ba'i cho ga byas pa la //
T02D2529:196a-44: bgegs ni med kyi ma 'jigs shig / ces gsungs
T02D2529:196a-45: pas bsrung ba las mi 'jigs pa rnyed cing de
T02D2529:196a-46: las bgegs med par gyur pa las grub pa ni
T02D2529:196a-48: gzhan du na rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2529:196b-0: @196b 'jigs las lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med //
T02D2529:196b-1: ces gsungs pa'i bgegs ldang ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:196b-2: de ltar lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag
T02D2529:196b-3: pa bsrung ba chen pos bsrung ba de tshe 'di
T02D2529:196b-4: nyid la mngon par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2529:196b-5: bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa la 'jug dgos shing
T02D2529:196b-6: / de yang yul khyad par can la brten pas 'grub pa'i phyir /
T02D2529:196b-7: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas rdo rje
T02D2529:196b-8: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po mdun nyid du 'grub
T02D2529:196b-9: par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te
T02D2529:196b-10: / 'di'i sngags dang phyag rgya lan gcig g-yas nas
T02D2529:196b-11: bskor bas khang pa brtsegs ma dang bcas pa lha
T02D2529:196b-12: rnams 'grub pas na 'dis phyogs thams cad du g-yas
T02D2529:196b-13: nas bskor bas dkyil 'khor thams cad sprul bar 'gyur
T02D2529:196b-15: gzhan dag ni lha ji snyed pa'i grangs kyi phyir
T02D2529:196b-16: 'gyed par g-yas nas bskor bas lha rnams 'ba' zhig
T02D2529:196b-18: khang pa brtsegs ma med ces zer ro //
T02D2529:196b-19: de ltar dkyil 'khor sprul par zhugs nas /
T02D2529:196b-20: da ni tshogs bsags pa'i bya ba la 'jug par
T02D2529:196b-21: bstan pa de nas dkyil 'khor blos mngon sum dang
T02D2529:196b-22: 'dra bar dmigs la me tog la sogs pas yang
T02D2529:196b-23: dag par mchod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2529:196b-25: 'dir bsam par bya ba 'ga' zhig yod de kha
T02D2529:196b-26: cig na re gang du yang dang por phyag 'tshal
T02D2529:196b-27: ba dang / de nas mchod pa dang /
T02D2529:196b-29: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2529:196b-31: gsol ba gdab pa'i mthar yongs su bsngo ba byas pa yin la /
T02D2529:196b-32: 'og nas slob ma 'jug pa la yang rim pa
T02D2529:196b-33: de ltar byas pas 'dir yang go rims de nyid
T02D2529:196b-35: de bzhin du 'chad par gyur pa las de ltar
T02D2529:196b-36: mchod pa rnam pa nyi shus de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2529:196b-37: thams cad yang dag par mchod la zhes bya ba
T02D2529:196b-38: 'dir mchod pa bco brgyad las ma smos pas mchod
T02D2529:196b-39: pa gnyis gzhan nas 'dir drang ngo zhes zer ro
T02D2529:196b-40: // de la dang po la brjod pa bden mod kyi 'on kyang 'di la yang gnod pa med /
T02D2529:196b-41: 'dir dang po mchod pa dang phyag btsal ba bya ste /
T02D2529:197a-0: de nas sdig pa bshags pa @197a * //
T02D2529:197a-1: nas gsol ba gdab pa'i bar du byas la /
T02D2529:197a-2: yang mchod pa bco brgyad byas nas bdag dbul ba dang yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T02D2529:197a-3: sdom pa gzung ba bstan pa 'di la nyes pa
T02D2529:197a-4: med pa ni rgyud dang mdo sde dang de dang
T02D2529:197a-5: der byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pas dang po
T02D2529:197a-6: mchod pa bkod pas mchod la /
T02D2529:197a-7: de nas phyag btsal bar snang la kha cig tu
T02D2529:197a-8: rim pa gzhan du yang snang ba 'di la nges
T02D2529:197a-9: par gcig bsgrub pa'i nges pa med pas gong du
T02D2529:197a-10: gang bstan pa nyid tshad mar bya'o //
T02D2529:197a-11: gang du yang lung mthong ba dang 'gal bar bya
T02D2529:197a-12: ba ni sngags kyi lam 'dir med kyi lung gi
T02D2529:197a-13: lung gzhan rnam par phye ba ni ma gtogs so
T02D2529:197a-14: // 'dod pa gnyis pa la yang brjod pa ni 'dir mchod pa gnyis gang dag drang zhe na /
T02D2529:197a-15: 'og nas las kyi rgyal po mchog gi skabs nas
T02D2529:197a-16: yon chab dang bshos dbul ba 'byung bas 'dir drang
T02D2529:197a-17: bar rigs te / yon chab ni mchod pa gzhan
T02D2529:197a-18: gyi sngon du byed pa'i phyir rigs la 'dod pa'i
T02D2529:197a-19: yon tan lnga las ro yang 'dir smos te des
T02D2529:197a-20: na gnyis 'dir drang ngo zhes zer ro //
T02D2529:197a-21: de ni ma yin te yon chab ni gang du lha spyan drang ba der dbul ba yin te /
T02D2529:197a-22: 'di skad du de nas spobs pa'i blo gros g-yog 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das bsu nas /
T02D2529:197a-23: yon chab dang zhabs bsil dbul bas bcom ldan 'das
T02D2529:197a-24: kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas zhes gsungs
T02D2529:197a-25: pa lta bu'o // 'dir ni lha rnams sprul pa
T02D2529:197a-26: tsam las spyan drang ba med pa mi 'thad de
T02D2529:197a-27: pa lta bu'o // / 'dir sprul zhes bya ba
T02D2529:197a-28: yang ji ltar thams cad du khyab pa chos kyi
T02D2529:197a-29: sku las sngags dang phyag rgya'i dbye bas gzugs kyi
T02D2529:197a-30: skur snang ba shar ba tsam la bya la /
T02D2529:197a-31: de yang tha snyad kyi bden par byon pa las 'das pa'o //
T02D2529:197a-32: de bzhin du bya ba'i rgyud las ni lha bshos
T02D2529:197a-33: dbul ba gsang sngags kyi kha zas yin par 'dod
T02D2529:197a-34: pas na zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par
T02D2529:197a-35: rtog pa drag pos lha bshos dbul ba la rnam
T02D2529:197a-36: pa stong du nan tan byed pa yin la /
T02D2529:197a-37: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud 'dir ni sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2529:197a-38: chub sems dpa' zas kyi ltos pa dang bral ba
T02D2529:197a-39: rnams la nges par dbul ba'i tshegs kyis ci zhig
T02D2529:197b-0: bya'i / @197b gang du rang gi rnal 'byor 'phel ba dang /
T02D2529:197b-1: sems can rnams rjes su bsrung ba de tsam gtso
T02D2529:197b-2: bor gyur pas na nges par 'dir lha bshos dbul
T02D2529:197b-4: las kyi rgyal po mchog la sogs par ni lha
T02D2529:197b-5: rnams spyan drangs pas 'jig rten gyi lugs mi bor
T02D2529:197b-6: bar bya bas 'jug pa'i phyir de dag smos pas
T02D2529:197b-8: gzhan dag 'dir tshad med pa bzhi dang /
T02D2529:197b-9: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i mchod pa bsnan te
T02D2529:197b-10: nyi shu'o zhes zer na de dag yang lan gnyis
T02D2529:197b-11: smos pa la dgos pa med do //
T02D2529:197b-12: gzhan yang ae wam gyi sgra byung bar gyur pa la sbyar nas bdag dbul ba dang ;
T02D2529:197b-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mchod pa gnyis su brjod de /
T02D2529:197b-14: de lta na mchod gnas bdag dbul zhes bar du gcod pa'i tshig mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2529:197b-15: yang gzhan dag ni gos dang rgyan dag re re
T02D2529:197b-16: la shes rab dang ye shes dag re re bgrang
T02D2529:197b-17: na de dag gi sngags ma smos pa dang ;
T02D2529:197b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tsam du mdzad pa dang /
T02D2529:197b-19: dpag bsam gyi shing dang gos kyi shing dag smos
T02D2529:197b-20: pa na dpag bsam gyi shing las gos kyang 'byung
T02D2529:197b-21: bas de rgyan gyi rgyur smra ba de dag gi
T02D2529:197b-24: ji ltar sbyar ba'i mchod pa bco brgyad po ni
T02D2529:197b-25: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud du thun mong du grags pa
T02D2529:197b-26: rdzas la brten pa ma yin gyi /
T02D2529:197b-27: nang gi byed pa la rag las pa'i mchod pa ste /
T02D2529:197b-28: ku ru ku lle las byung ba las kyang mchod pa bco brgyad kyis mchod la zhes gsungs so //
T02D2529:197b-29: yang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi cho ga kha cig
T02D2529:197b-30: du de dag gi steng du me tog la sogs
T02D2529:197b-31: pa bzhi dngos su yod pa dang /
T02D2529:197b-32: phyag 'tshal ba bzhi la mchod pa gcig tu byas
T02D2529:197b-33: pa kho na la mchod pa nyi shu zhes 'dod
T02D2529:197b-34: de / des na 'dir yang dang po nyid du
T02D2529:197b-35: de nas blos dkyil 'khor mngon sum lta bur dmigs
T02D2529:197b-36: de / la / me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D2529:197b-37: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi mchod pa gcig
T02D2529:197b-38: ste me tog la sogs pas ni tshegs med pas
T02D2529:197b-40: cig shos la yang 'dod la yon chab dang lha
T02D2529:197b-41: bshos dag ni de lta ma yin pas 'dir nan
T02D2529:198a-0: de nas rigs bzhi'i phyag 'tshal ba ni bsnyen bkur gyi @198a * //
T02D2529:198a-1: mchod pa dang dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa dang 'jug
T02D2529:198a-2: pa'i mchod pa dang las kyi mchod pa bzhi'i ngo
T02D2529:198a-3: bo ste / de dag phyag 'tshal bas bsdus pas gcig go //
T02D2529:198a-4: de ltar 'dir mchod pa de nyid kho na nas bsnan pas mchod pa nyi shu ste /
T02D2529:198a-5: gzhan du na mchod pa bco brgyad las med par
T02D2529:198a-6: de ltar mchod pa nyi shu zhes ston na ni
T02D2529:198a-7: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas smad du 'khrul bar
T02D2529:198a-8: 'gyur te / bla ma'i lung la slob ma ltos
T02D2529:198a-9: par bya ba'i phyir ro zhen yang de lta na
T02D2529:198a-10: mtha' med pa'i gzhung phyin ci log dgos shing /
T02D2529:198a-11: 'di lta bu'i bya ba phal pa thams cad la
T02D2529:198a-12: phan pa lta zhog gi / don zab mo'i yul
T02D2529:198a-13: la mi smra ba la thug par 'gyur ro //
T02D2529:198a-14: sdom pa gzung ba med na mchod pa la sogs
T02D2529:198a-15: pa tsam gyis dngos grub thob par mi nus pas
T02D2529:198a-16: na sdom pa gzung bar bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T02D2529:198a-17: 'dir byang chub kyi sems ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2529:198a-19: de dag gnyis ka bskyed par bya ba yin pas
T02D2529:198a-20: dang po smon pa'i ngo bor bskyed par bgyi zhes
T02D2529:198a-22: 'jug pa'i byang chub kyi sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yin pas /
T02D2529:198a-23: de yang 'di gsang sngags kyi sgo nas spyad pa
T02D2529:198a-24: spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa khyad par
T02D2529:198a-25: can te / de blang ba ni dang po thun
T02D2529:198a-26: mong ba pha rol tu phyin pa'i sdom pa dang
T02D2529:198a-27: po bya bar rigs pas na de gzung ba'i phyir
T02D2529:198a-28: can te / / tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum //
T02D2529:198a-29: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:198a-30: de nas thun mong ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa blang ba ni /
T02D2529:198a-31: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02D2529:198a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:198a-34: gal te lha rnams kyis myur du byin gyis rlob
T02D2529:198a-35: par 'dod na dang po smon pa byang chub kyi
T02D2529:198a-37: de nas thun mong gi byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa gzung ngo //
T02D2529:198a-38: de nas thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub sems
T02D2529:198a-39: dpa'i sdom pa rig 'dzin gyi sdom par brjod pa
T02D2529:198a-40: blang ngo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2529:198a-42: sems can kun gyi don gyi rgyur //
T02D2529:198a-43: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02D2529:198b-0: dam pa bskyed pa @198b byas nas ni //
T02D2529:198b-1: sdom pa ma lus bzung ba yis //
T02D2529:198b-2: ma rgal ba ni bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02D2529:198b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa slar yang smon pa'i sems ni brtan por byas te /
T02D2529:198b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i legs pa thams cad kyi rten
T02D2529:198b-5: gyi gtso bo ni sman pa'i sems de kho na
T02D2529:198b-6: yin pas / de yang nas yang du brtan par bya ba ni ches rigs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2529:198b-7: de la thun mong gi sdom pa ni byang chub
T02D2529:198b-8: sems dpa'i sa'i tshul khrims kyi le'u las gsal lo
T02D2529:198b-9: // thun mong ma yin pa ni 'di lta ste /
T02D2529:198b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dkon mchog gsum bzung ba rnam ba gcig dang ;
T02D2529:198b-11: rdo rje'i rigs la rdo rje dang /
T02D2529:198b-12: dril bu'i phyag rgya bzung ba dang /
T02D2529:198b-13: slob dpon bzung ba ste gsum dang /
T02D2529:198b-14: rin po che'i rigs la zang zing dang /
T02D2529:198b-17: byams pa sbyin pa ste bzhi dang /
T02D2529:198b-18: padma'i rigs la phyi rol gyi chos zhes bya ba rig byed la sogs pa dang /
T02D2529:198b-19: gsang ba'i theg pa ste nyan thos dang /
T02D2529:198b-21: theg pa chen po ste de ltar gsum dang phyi
T02D2529:198b-22: rol gyi dang bzhi'i las kyi rigs la ni sdom
T02D2529:198b-23: pa thams cad dang ldan par bya ba dang /
T02D2529:198b-24: mchod pa'i las bya ba ste gnyis so //
T02D2529:198b-25: de ltar gcig dang gsum dang bzhi dang bzhi dang gnyis la bcu bzhi yin pas na /
T02D2529:198b-26: 'og nas kyang 'di dag slob ma la sbyin la bdag nyid kyang 'di dag gzung ba'o //
T02D2529:198b-27: da ni skabs 'dir cung zab brjod pa yang yod de /
T02D2529:198b-28: theg pa chen po mthar thug pa'i don du dkon mchog gcig kho nar 'dod de /
T02D2529:198b-29: lam dang lam sgom pa po gcig pa'i rgyud yin pa dang /
T02D2529:198b-30: bstan pa dang ston pa po yang rgyud gcig pa dang /
T02D2529:198b-31: don dam pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa las tha dad pa ma yin te /
T02D2529:198b-32: de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas dang //
T02D2529:198b-33: phan tshun brtan pa rten med cing //
T02D2529:198b-34: rnam grangs khas mi len pa dang //
T02D2529:198b-36: des na sangs rgyas dkon mchog nyid chos dkon mchog go //
T02D2529:198b-37: sems dpa'i chen po rdo re sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2529:198b-38: pa yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sprul pa bkod
T02D2529:199a-1: 'dun dkon mchog kyang sangs rgyas dkon mchog nyid do //
T02D2529:199a-2: de dag kun rdzob la yang de dag mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir /
T02D2529:199a-3: 'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen
T02D2529:199a-4: po'i mdo las sangs rgyas dkon mchog 'ba' zhig la
T02D2529:199a-5: skyabs su 'gro bar bya ba rgyas par nges par
T02D2529:199a-6: gsungs te / de ltar rgyu mtshan gcig pa'i rten gzung bas sdom pa de gcig go //
T02D2529:199a-7: padma'i rigs la kha cig phyi zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D2529:199a-8: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa chen po yin la /
T02D2529:199a-9: gsang ba'i theg pa ni gsum ste /
T02D2529:199a-10: bya ba dang spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi theg pa'o zhes zer te /
T02D2529:199a-11: de ni mi rigs te de dag phyi rol par bzhag pa nam yang mi 'thad de /
T02D2529:199a-12: chos 'di pa zhes gsal por grub ste /
T02D2529:199a-13: skyabs 'dra ba dang bdag med par 'dra ba'i lta ba can dang /
T02D2529:199a-14: mi rtag par lta ba dang mya ngan las 'das
T02D2529:199a-15: par zhi bar 'dod pa dang 'dus byas sdug bsngal
T02D2529:199a-16: bar 'dod pa ci tsam gyis phyi nang du brjod
T02D2529:199a-17: pas so // des na 'og nas kyang tshul thams
T02D2529:199a-18: cad bstan pa'i theg pa gsum gyi nges par 'byung
T02D2529:199a-19: ba sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgo yang mngon du byas
T02D2529:199a-21: theg pa gsum gyi rab kyi mthar thug pa sngags kyi theg pa ste ;
T02D2529:199a-22: de ni theg pa chen po nyid du 'dus zhes dgongs pa'o //
T02D2529:199a-23: de'i phyir dang por bstan par gzung ngo //
T02D2529:199a-24: las kyi rigs la yang sdom pa thams cad ldan
T02D2529:199a-25: pa zhes bya ba la lar 'dul ba'i dbang gis
T02D2529:199a-26: mu stegs kyi sdom pa dang dka' thub dang brtul
T02D2529:199a-27: zhugs drag po yang bsten par bya ba ste /
T02D2529:199a-28: ji ltar 'phags pa dkon mchog sgron ma'i mdo las rgya cher bstan pa lta bu'o //
T02D2529:199a-29: de bzhin du sems can dag gang gis 'dul ba dang /
T02D2529:199a-30: sangs rgyas rnams gang gis mnyes pa 'di tsam la las kyi rigs kyi sdom pa brjod do //
T02D2529:199a-31: rigs gzhan gyi sdom pa ni go bar sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T02D2529:199a-32: da ni de ltar mchod pa la sogs sngon du
T02D2529:199a-33: 'gro bas byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis bskyed
T02D2529:199a-34: pa byas pa de la bya ba gzhan bstan pa'i
T02D2529:199a-35: phyir ye shes dbab pa bstan te /
T02D2529:199a-37: byang chub kyi sems ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T02D2529:199a-38: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'o //
T02D2529:199a-39: de la sngar bstan pa gnyis pa kun rdzob pa ste /
T02D2529:199b-0: @199b bsod nams kyi chogs tsam mo //
T02D2529:199b-1: de las gong du don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2529:199b-2: de ma bskyed na chos kyi sku 'grub par mi rung bas de bskyed par rigs so //
T02D2529:199b-3: don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems de yang sngar
T02D2529:199b-4: dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa na bla ma'i drin
T02D2529:199b-5: gyis btang ste / rang gi las kyi mthun rkyen
T02D2529:199b-6: lha rnams kyis mdzad pas lan 'ga' nyams su myong
T02D2529:199b-7: gyis btang ste / ba'o // da 'dir bla ma la mi ltos pas rang gis dbab par bya'o //
T02D2529:199b-8: 'dir ye shes de ji ltar dbab dgos pa ni
T02D2529:199b-9: gang dbab pa'i rnam par dbye ba ji lta bu
T02D2529:199b-10: 'di'i sgra don ji ltar bstan zhe na /
T02D2529:199b-11: de dag cung zad brjod de /
T02D2529:199b-12: de nas gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i rab tu sbyor
T02D2529:199b-13: bas phyag rgya bcing ba sngon du 'gro ba'i cho
T02D2529:199b-14: ga thams cad rdzas su bsgrub bo zhes bya ba
T02D2529:199b-15: la sogs pa ni 'di ji ltar dbab pa'i thabs
T02D2529:199b-16: te / ji ltar so sor rtog pa'i shes rab
T02D2529:199b-17: las rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'byung bas
T02D2529:199b-18: na 'dir dang po gcig dang du ma nyid bral
T02D2529:199b-20: mi rgyu ba sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang chu'i zla ba ltar mos par byas la /
T02D2529:199b-21: rdo rje thal mo dam por bsdams nas lag pa
T02D2529:199b-22: g-yas g-yon dag 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
T02D2529:199b-23: par gyur cing gang du de gnyis la mngon par
T02D2529:199b-24: zhen pa dam pos gnas pa de da lta mi
T02D2529:199b-25: gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pas /
T02D2529:199b-26: de dag dral te gnyi gal chags pa bcad ces shes pa dang /
T02D2529:199b-27: de nas badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes pas rdo
T02D2529:199b-28: rje lta bu'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D2529:199b-29: thob pa ste / skad cig thang cig yud tsam
T02D2529:199b-30: zhig la mi gnas pa dag cing ji tsam srid
T02D2529:199b-31: pa'i grong khyer 'di rab tu gsal bar lan cig
T02D2529:199b-32: sgyu ma ltar nyams su myong ba de srid du
T02D2529:199b-33: brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtan par bya ba'i chog
T02D2529:199b-34: thob pa ste / bshad do // thabs de ltar
T02D2529:199b-35: phab pa'i dgos pa ni thams cad sgyu ma ltar
T02D2529:199b-36: shes pas bya ba thams cad la dngos por mngon
T02D2529:199b-37: par zhen pa bor bas rab tu mthu dang ldan
T02D2529:199b-38: thob pa ste / bshad do // par gyur to
T02D2529:199b-39: // dngos por dmigs pa med pa las byung ba
T02D2529:199b-41: rgyas pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i phyir //
T02D2529:199b-42: sa bon drung po'i myug sogs bzhin //
T02D2529:200a-1: lag las bshad pa bzhin no //
T02D2529:200a-2: de la dbab pa'i rnam par dbye ba gang zhe na /
T02D2529:200a-3: de ni sems dpa' dbab pa dang /
T02D2529:200a-8: dang po dkyil 'khor du slob dpon bdag nyid 'jug
T02D2529:200a-9: pa na sems dpa' chen po gang rung zhig bdag
T02D2529:200a-10: nyid kho na la dbab pa byas la dge ba
T02D2529:200a-11: dang mi dge ba la shes par bya'o //
T02D2529:200a-12: 'di yang rtsa ba'i rgyud nyid las gsal por gsungs so //
T02D2529:200a-13: de la rdo rje dbab pa gang zhe na /
T02D2529:200a-14: dkyil 'khor chen por slob ma 'jug pa na slob
T02D2529:200a-15: ma snod du gyur pa dang ma gyur pa brtag
T02D2529:200a-16: pa dang / bya ba dag nges par shes par
T02D2529:200a-17: bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyi snying ga'i rdo rje
T02D2529:200a-18: las slob ma'i snying gar dbab pa'i cho ga ste
T02D2529:200a-20: ye shes dbab pa ni gnas skabs 'di nyid du ji ltar bstan pa'o //
T02D2529:200a-21: de dag las gzhan pa'i dbab pa tha mal pa
T02D2529:200a-22: ni rnal 'byor dang bya ba'i rgyud de dang de
T02D2529:200a-23: dag tu me long dang mthe bong dang ral gri
T02D2529:200a-24: la sogs pa la dbab pa'i chog bstan pa ste
T02D2529:200a-25: / de dag kyang phal cher 'bras bu mtshungs pa
T02D2529:200a-26: ni 'og nas rgyud kyi tshig mdor smos pa las
T02D2529:200a-27: / / babs na de'i skad cig kho na la
T02D2529:200a-28: mngon par shes pa lnga la sogs pa 'grub par
T02D2529:200a-30: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni dman pa phal gyi bya ba tha mal tsam dang /
T02D2529:200a-31: mchog rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dag bsdu ste /
T02D2529:200a-32: bas pa'i yon tan rgya cher ni rgyud las khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2529:200a-33: gzhan dag ni 'dir rtog ge dag la ye shes 'jug //
T02D2529:200a-34: ces bya ba'i lugs kyis kun rdzob shes pa skye'i
T02D2529:200a-35: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni ma yin
T02D2529:200a-36: no zhen / de ni ma yin te rnam par
T02D2529:200a-37: mi rtog pa'i ye shes zhes gsungs pa ma nges
T02D2529:200a-38: pa dang 'di las rnam par mi rtog pa mi
T02D2529:200a-39: skye ba'i mngon par shes pa lnga skye ba'i rgyu
T02D2529:200a-41: 'on kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye ba ni dka' la gzhan rnyed sla ba'o //
T02D2529:200a-42: de la ye shes dbab pa zhes bya ba'i ming
T02D2529:200a-43: gi don ni rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2529:200a-44: rje sems dpa' ye shes sems dpa' de la phyogs
T02D2529:200b-0: bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi @200b ye shes
T02D2529:200b-1: kyi rdo rje rnams dbab pa ste /
T02D2529:200b-2: dril bu'i dus kho nar bdag dang de bzhin gshegs
T02D2529:200b-3: pa rnams kyi thugs ka phye nas de dag gzhugs
T02D2529:200b-4: par gyur par mos pas 'di 'grub bo //
T02D2529:200b-5: gang yang dang po dkyil 'khor du bla mas ye
T02D2529:200b-6: shes dbab pa'i bya ba ma byas pa des ni
T02D2529:200b-7: de nyams su myong ba des na nam yang dbab
T02D2529:200b-8: par mi nus par shes par bya'o //
T02D2529:200b-9: de ltar bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags shing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa des /
T02D2529:200b-10: da ni gzhan gyi don bya bar 'os pas ngan
T02D2529:200b-11: 'gro'i sems can rnams thar bar bya ba'i sbyor ba
T02D2529:200b-12: brtan pa badzra mushti zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2529:200b-13: ste / 'dir don ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
T02D2529:200b-14: khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas ngan 'gro'i 'gro ba
T02D2529:200b-15: rnams rang dbang med par bkug ste thar bar byas
T02D2529:200b-16: ste / pa ltar / rnal 'byor pa rdo rje
T02D2529:200b-17: khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas khams gsum rnam par rgyal
T02D2529:200b-18: ba'i phyag rgyar btab par gyur pa des kyang ngan
T02D2529:200b-19: song ba rnams dang por bkug la de nas sdig
T02D2529:200b-20: pa dral ba thar par bya ste /
T02D2529:200b-21: 'dir sems can so so'i snying la sdig pa'i gzugs
T02D2529:200b-22: sha za ltar mi sdug cing skra grol ba gcer
T02D2529:200b-23: bu mche ba gtsigs pa mi'u thung dag gnas pa
T02D2529:200b-24: dral ba'i phyag rgyas phyir 'thon te /
T02D2529:200b-25: de la rdo rje khu tshur gyis bsnun pas med par gyur par bsams te /
T02D2529:200b-26: sems can de dag kyang ngan 'gro'i lus las 'phos te lha'i 'jig rten du gyur par bsam zhing /
T02D2529:200b-27: de dag gi ngan 'gro'i lus kyang ba tsha'i rgya
T02D2529:200b-28: mtshor bor bar gyur par bsam pa ni rnal 'byor
T02D2529:200b-30: 'dir ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dum bu
T02D2529:200b-31: las gsal por rtogs par bya ste cho ga'i khyad
T02D2529:200b-32: par 'di dag gis rnal 'byor pa'i gnas de ri
T02D2529:200b-33: rab kyi rtse mor gyur par mos par bya'o //
T02D2529:200b-34: gzhan dag ni de ni mngon par byang chub pa brnyes kyi gnas te /
T02D2529:200b-35: da lta ni mi'i yul du gyur pas so zhes zer te /
T02D2529:200b-37: phyag rgya gcig pa la sogs pa la mngon par
T02D2529:200b-38: byang chub pa'i nges pa med kyis rnal 'byor chen
T02D2529:200b-39: po tsam las mi byed kyang ri rab kyi rtse
T02D2529:200b-40: mor gyur pa ni mi dor ro //
T02D2529:200b-41: de ltar bdag dang gzhan la phan pa spyad nas da ni rang gi lha dran pa dang /
T02D2529:201a-0: sngar gyi dkyil 'khor sbrul pa byas pa de dgrol @201a * //
T02D2529:201a-2: de nas rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2529:201a-3: de'i sngags lan gsum brjod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2529:201a-4: rnam par snang mdzad nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar
T02D2529:201a-5: du rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yin pa de
T02D2529:201a-6: kho na'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pas de
T02D2529:201a-7: kho na'i sngags lan gsum brjod de /
T02D2529:201a-9: dang po khro bo rdo rje 'bar ba nyi ma'i
T02D2529:201a-10: me lta bur bdag bskyed pa nas da lta ngan
T02D2529:201a-11: 'gro ba thar bar bya ba'i bar du khro bo'i
T02D2529:201a-12: rnal 'byor la gnas pas bya ba mang zhig byas
T02D2529:201a-13: pas / rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor rjes su dran
T02D2529:201a-14: pa yun ring du bor bas lha spang ba dang
T02D2529:201a-15: 'dra bar gyur pas de dra par bya ba'i phyir
T02D2529:201a-16: pas / ro // gzhan dag rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2529:201a-17: la sogs pa'i lha ma lus pa'i sngags dang phyag
T02D2529:201a-18: rgyas bya'o zhes zer ba ni mi 'thad de /
T02D2529:201a-19: de ltar na de rnams kyis zhes mang po'i tshig tu ston pa'i rigs la /
T02D2529:201a-20: de ltar byas na yang dgos pa chen po ma dmigs pas de spang ngo //
T02D2529:201a-21: 'dis rang rang gi snying gar dgrol te /
T02D2529:201a-22: aom badzra mu: zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyag
T02D2529:201a-23: rgya'i tshogs ji ltar bcings pa rnams rang gi snying
T02D2529:201a-24: ga'i nam mkha' la dgrol ba ste /
T02D2529:201a-25: gzugs kyi sku'i ngo bor rdo rje rgyu'i sngags dang
T02D2529:201a-26: phyag rgyas rang dbang med par bcings pa las bkrol
T02D2529:201a-27: la slar chos kyi sku'i dang du bzhud par bya
T02D2529:201a-28: ba'o // ji ltar nam mkha' la glog snang ba
T02D2529:201a-29: de nyid du thim par gyur pa'i dpes 'dir de
T02D2529:201a-30: ltar nam mkha' las lta'i skur snang ba rnams slar
T02D2529:201a-31: de nyid du bstim pa ste 'dis ni 'og nas
T02D2529:201a-32: tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don yang
T02D2529:201a-34: 'di la dgos pa ci yod ce na /
T02D2529:201a-35: de'i phyir de ltar phyag rgya thams cad ma spangs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2529:201a-36: rang gi lha dran pa dang phyag rgya dgrol ba
T02D2529:201a-37: de ltar na phyag rgya thams cad de lhag pa'i
T02D2529:201a-38: lha dang dkyil 'khor thams cad do //
T02D2529:201a-39: ma spangs par gyur pa ni rjes su dran pa'i sgo nas de ma btang ba dang /
T02D2529:201a-40: lha rnams slar gshegs su gsol ba yang gus pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02D2529:201a-41: lha la brnyas pa spangs pas na lha rnams kyi
T02D2529:201b-0: spyi dang khyad par du bcas @201b pa bas spang
T02D2529:201b-1: zhing brnyas par ma byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2529:201b-2: de ltar na rang gi lha dran pa ni phyag rgya bkrol nas bya ba'i rigs she na /
T02D2529:201b-4: dkyil 'khor pa'i khong na rang gi lha mngon sum
T02D2529:201b-5: du bzhugs pa kho na la dran pa gsal pos
T02D2529:201b-6: dran par bya bar rigs shing phyag rgya bkrol ba'i
T02D2529:201b-7: rjes la ni dran pa'i yul gsal po med pa'i
T02D2529:201b-8: phyir dang / rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor
T02D2529:201b-9: chen po byin gyis brlab pa yang 'jug pas de
T02D2529:201b-10: dran pa ngang gis kyang 'byung bas de nyid ches
T02D2529:201b-11: phyir dang / 'tsham pa'o // de nas da ni
T02D2529:201b-12: cho ga ji snyed sngar spyad pa thams cad kyang
T02D2529:201b-13: phan yon bsdus te bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2529:201b-14: 'dis byas pas rnal 'byor pa bskal pa grangs med
T02D2529:201b-15: pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems
T02D2529:201b-16: dpa'i dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste
T02D2529:201b-17: sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D2529:201b-18: don to // ji ltar zhe na /
T02D2529:201b-19: 'di na skyes bu chen po slob pa theg pa chen po la gnyis te /
T02D2529:201b-20: byang chub sems dpa' dang rdo rje 'chang ngo //
T02D2529:201b-21: mi slob pa yang gnyis te /
T02D2529:201b-22: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D2529:201b-23: de 'dir byang chub sems dpa' chen po bskal ba
T02D2529:201b-24: grangs med pa dang pos 'jig rten chos kyi mchog
T02D2529:201b-25: thob cing / bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis pas sa brgyad pa mi g-yo ba thob pas na /
T02D2529:201b-26: der shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bslang ste /
T02D2529:201b-27: yid kyi lus thob pas sems can gyi don mtha'
T02D2529:201b-28: yas pa cig car sgrub pas bskal pa grangs med
T02D2529:201b-29: pa gsum pa las nges par byung nas sa bcu
T02D2529:201b-30: pa'i dbang phyug chen por 'og min du 'di'i rnam
T02D2529:201b-31: par smin pa'i lus 'grub pa ste /
T02D2529:201b-32: 'di bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T02D2529:201b-33: gnas skabs de snyed slob pa byang chub sems dpa'o //
T02D2529:201b-34: de la de dang 'dra ba ni rdo rje 'chang ste /
T02D2529:201b-35: sngags kyi lam dag gis byas pa ste /
T02D2529:201b-36: tshe 'di nyid la de dang 'dra ba ni nang
T02D2529:201b-37: gi bdag nyid kyi khrus byas pas bdag med pa
T02D2529:201b-38: gnyis mthong bas mthong ba'i lam ste /
T02D2529:201b-39: de nas ngag dag pa nas bzung ste sdom pa
T02D2529:201b-40: gzung ba'i mthar thug pa ni lhag ma drug go
T02D2529:202a-0: // @202a * // de nas ye shes dbab pa ni sa brgyad pa ni ye shes tsam gyi sa'o //
T02D2529:202a-1: de'i 'og tu ngan 'gro sbyang zhing phyag rgya grol
T02D2529:202a-2: ba ni sa brgyad pa las langs tes dgu pa
T02D2529:202a-3: dang sa bcu pa'i ngo bo ste /
T02D2529:202a-4: 'di dag gi 'jig rten pa'i sa bskal pa grangs
T02D2529:202a-5: med pa gcig gis bgrod par bya ba ni dang
T02D2529:202a-6: po dbang bskur zhing bla ma'i lha'i lus su byas
T02D2529:202a-7: pa kho na'o // 'di tsam gyis rdo rje 'chang slob pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2529:202a-8: de nas sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug de nyid skye
T02D2529:202a-9: ba gcig gis thogs pa'i ngo bo dga' ldan du
T02D2529:202a-10: byon pa ni rnal 'byor chen por byin gyis brlab
T02D2529:202a-11: pa'o // de nyid srid pa tha mar gyur pa
T02D2529:202a-12: ni rnal 'byor chen po rdzogs par bya ba ste
T02D2529:202a-13: pa'o // / de'i 'og tu rdo rje lta bu'i
T02D2529:202a-14: ting nge 'dzin bar chad med pa'i lam de ni
T02D2529:202a-15: mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2529:202a-16: de nas de'i 'og tu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
T02D2529:202a-17: sngags kyi lam gyi mngon par byang chub pa ni slob pa'o //
T02D2529:202a-18: gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nyan thos rnams dang
T02D2529:202a-19: thun mong pa'i sprul pa'i sku byang chub pa ni
T02D2529:202a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa ste mi slob pa'o //
T02D2529:202a-21: de ltar lam dang 'bras bu mtha' dag tha dad
T02D2529:202a-22: par byas pa 'di ni skye bo lam tha dad
T02D2529:202a-23: pa la dga' ba'i ngor byas pa kho na ste
T02D2529:202a-25: de nyid kyi phyir kha cig tu mngon par byang
T02D2529:202a-26: chub pa lnga nyid la mthong ba'i lam la sogs
T02D2529:202a-27: pa sbyar ba bstan par zad do //
T02D2529:202a-28: de ltar don dag brjod nas da ni bar chad
T02D2529:202a-29: med pa'i lam gyi stegs su gyur pa rnal 'byor
T02D2529:202a-30: chen po'i cho ga brjod de /
T02D2529:202a-31: de la rnal 'byor chen po yang lhag par gnas pa dang /
T02D2529:202a-32: de rdzogs par bya bas gnyis te /
T02D2529:202a-33: dang po bdag nyid lhag pa'i lha'i rnal 'byor du lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D2529:202a-34: gnyis pa ni de nyid bstan par byed pa'i yan lag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
T02D2529:202a-36: chen po yang yin pas rnal 'byor chen po'am /
T02D2529:202a-37: 'di rnal 'byor rnams kyi nang na che bas na
T02D2529:202a-38: rnal 'byor chen po ste mchog tu rgyas pa'i rgyu
T02D2529:202a-40: bdag nyid chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2529:202a-41: shin tu byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2529:202a-42: 'bras bu chen pos bskyed pas na 'di ni chen po'o //
T02D2529:202a-43: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'am /
T02D2529:202b-0: tshul bzhin yid la @202b byed par sbyor bas na rnal 'byor ro //
T02D2529:202b-1: de tsam zhig sbyor ba brjod nas da ni lhag
T02D2529:202b-2: par gnas pa la sogs pa'i go rims brjod de
T02D2529:202b-3: / dang po nyid du bdag med pa bsgom zhing
T02D2529:202b-4: zla ba zung de dang de las rang gi mtshan
T02D2529:202b-6: de la nga rgyal bya zhing sprul pa bsdu ba
T02D2529:202b-7: la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha'i lus su gyur pa
T02D2529:202b-8: dang / de la dam tshig dang phyag rgya chen pos byin gyis brlab cing /
T02D2529:202b-9: dkyil 'khor sprul pa zhugs la dbang bskur ba blangs te /
T02D2529:202b-10: rdo rje'i brtul zhugs blangs pa 'di tsam zhig la
T02D2529:202b-11: rang lhag par gnas pa'i rim pa yis rnal 'byor
T02D2529:202b-13: de na de la rang gi snying la son pa'i
T02D2529:202b-14: rdo rje'i dbus su rang gi lha'i snying po sa
T02D2529:202b-15: m'a ya bris la zhes bya ba la /
T02D2529:202b-16: de nas ni phyag rgya btang nas so //
T02D2529:202b-17: rang gi zhes bya ba ni khro bo'i lus kyi ste /
T02D2529:202b-18: gzhan dag ni lus tha mal pa zhes zer la /
T02D2529:202b-19: gzhan dag ni dang po bla mas rdo rje dbab
T02D2529:202b-20: pa'i dus su bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyis zer te
T02D2529:202b-21: / bsrung ba ldan pas lha'i lus bsgom pa rigs la /
T02D2529:202b-22: lha'i lus grub nas de nyid kyis bsrung bar gsungs pas phyogs dang po blang ngo //
T02D2529:202b-23: rang gi snying la son pa'i rdo rje ni snying ste /
T02D2529:202b-24: snying gi nang du son pa zhes bya ba dang
T02D2529:202b-25: por bla mas rdo rje dbab pa'i dus su byin
T02D2529:202b-26: pas bla ma'i thugs las 'thon te 'dir son pa'o
T02D2529:202b-27: // rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2529:202b-28: de'i dbus ni lte ba'i nang du'o //
T02D2529:202b-29: rang gi lha'i snying po ni badzra tva zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2529:202b-30: don 'di ni gzhan las snying ni sngags kyi gnas
T02D2529:202b-31: yin par shes na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes
T02D2529:202b-32: bya ba dang / rtsa ba'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D2529:202b-33: ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i snying la gnas //
T02D2529:202b-34: de bas snying po zhes bya'o //
T02D2529:202b-36: 'dir ting nge 'dzin yang rnal 'byor chen po'o //
T02D2529:202b-37: gzhan dag ni 'dir rang gi snying rtogs pa zhes zer te /
T02D2529:202b-38: skad kyi byings las ga ta'i sgra rtogs par 'dres pas so //
T02D2529:202b-39: rtogs pa de yang rdor je ste rdo rje sems
T02D2529:202b-40: dpa' zhi ba mdog dkar po rdo rje dang dril
T02D2529:202b-41: bu 'chang ba'o // de'i dbus ni de'i thugs ka'i zla ba la ste /
T02D2529:202b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' me long bzhin //
T02D2529:202b-44: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02D2529:203a-2: bu khyod kyi ni snying la gnas //
T02D2529:203a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang 'tsham la /
T02D2529:203a-4: 'di'i mthus kyang gang 'dod pa'i lha'i lus su 'gyur ro //
T02D2529:203a-5: de bzhin du rin po che la sogs pa yang rang rang gi sems dpa' chen po'o //
T02D2529:203a-7: gang du gnod pa med pa der ni gzhung gzhan
T02D2529:203a-8: du drang ba la dgos pa med pas shin tu
T02D2529:203a-10: sa ma ya bris la zhes pa ni 'dir sa
T02D2529:203a-11: ma ya'i sgra ni don du ma la 'jug par
T02D2529:203a-12: mthong ste / don du ma bsdus pa las /
T02D2529:203a-13: sa ma ya mnyam ji bzhin spyod /
T02D2529:203a-14: grub pa'i mtha' dang phun sum tshogs //
T02D2529:203a-15: khrims bya gzhan yang rgyas par bstan //
T02D2529:203a-16: brda dang dus dang skad rnams so //
T02D2529:203a-18: de las 'dir gang zhig nges par gzung bar rigs she na /
T02D2529:203a-19: kha cig ni phun sum tshogs pa la bsngags pa byed do //
T02D2529:203a-20: lha'i snying po kha dog dang dbyi bas phun sum
T02D2529:203a-21: tshogs pa beed'urya bzhu bas bris pa ltar zla ba
T02D2529:203a-23: yang gzhan dag ni 'di ltar mnyam pa la bsngags pa byed de /
T02D2529:203a-24: ma chad ma lhag la yi ge mnyam par bri'o zhes so //
T02D2529:203a-25: kha cig ni 'dir khrims su bya bar 'dod de
T02D2529:203a-26: ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu sgrub pa na snying
T02D2529:203a-27: po snying la bsgom pa ni nges par 'da' bar
T02D2529:203a-28: bya ba ma yin pas dam tshig ste /
T02D2529:203a-29: rgyu yi yul las mi 'da' bas //
T02D2529:203a-30: dam tshig ces ni mngon par brjod //
T02D2529:203a-31: ces bshad pas ting nge 'dzin 'grub pa'i rgyu'i spyod
T02D2529:203a-32: yul las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir 'di yid
T02D2529:203a-33: kyis bris la bsgom pa ste /
T02D2529:203a-34: des nas ma ya ni rtogs par yang drangs la khrims su bya bar yang drang ste /
T02D2529:203a-35: rtogs pas bri'am dam tshig gis bri zhes zer ro //
T02D2529:203a-36: thams cad kyang don dang ma 'brel pa ma yin mod kyi /
T02D2529:203a-37: spyod pa ji lta bar drangs na thams cad 'du bas de nyid bsngags so //
T02D2529:203a-38: de nyid rang gi lha'i gzugs su rnam par bsams
T02D2529:203a-39: te zhes bya ba ni ji ltar snying ga'i phyag
T02D2529:203a-40: rgya'i lus su gyur pa ltar de'i rten bdag kyang
T02D2529:203a-41: lha'i lus su gyur pa ni bya ba dang byed
T02D2529:203a-42: pa po tha mi dad pas brtags pas so //
T02D2529:203a-43: snying gar son pa'i dkyil 'khor du yid kyis 'jug
T02D2529:203b-0: go zhes bya ba ni lus bkod pa gnyis @203b
T02D2529:203b-1: pa ste ; ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' spyan
T02D2529:203b-2: ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi spu'i bu ga na
T02D2529:203b-3: gnas pa'i drang srong dag la chos ston par byed
T02D2529:203b-4: pa'i lus bkod pa bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D2529:203b-5: phreng ba de yang rang gi spyi bor zhes bya
T02D2529:203b-6: ba ni dkyil 'khor gnyis ka'i nang na yod pas
T02D2529:203b-7: na zhes dgos pa snying ga'i thad ka phyi rol
T02D2529:203b-8: tu bsgom pa sngar tshogs bsags pa'i yul lta bu
T02D2529:203b-10: sems ma rdo rje ma bcings pa yang tishtha badzra
T02D2529:203b-11: zhes brjod pa'i 'dis snying gar dgrol lo zhes bya
T02D2529:203b-12: ba 'di ni rtsa ba'i rgyud las slob dpon dkyil
T02D2529:203b-13: 'khor du 'jug pa na 'di'i phyag rgya phyed ma'i
T02D2529:203b-14: gung mo g-yas pa'i chang pas yang dang yang drangs
T02D2529:203b-15: pas bdag nyid la sems dpa' dbab pa bya ba
T02D2529:203b-16: gsungs pas 'dir yang de bzhin no zhes rtog pa
T02D2529:203b-17: srid pas na de dgag pa 'dir ni dbab pa
T02D2529:203b-18: ma yin gyi phyag rgya de rang gi snying ga'i
T02D2529:203b-19: sems ma'i rdo rje ma'i rang bzhin du slar brtan
T02D2529:203b-20: par bkod de gzhag ces ba'i don to //
T02D2529:203b-21: gzhan dag ni 'dir dkyil 'khor slar sngon bzhin bstims pa yin la /
T02D2529:203b-22: 'og nas snying ga'i zla bar dkyil 'khor de gcig
T02D2529:203b-23: tu gyur par bsam mo zhes bya ba ni slar
T02D2529:203b-24: dkyil 'khor gcig tu rten zla ba gcig la brten
T02D2529:203b-25: pas gcig tu rdzogs par bskyed ces zer na /
T02D2529:203b-26: 'dir de slar btang ba la dgos pa med pa dang /
T02D2529:203b-27: dbang bskur ba yang dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar blang bar bya ba dang /
T02D2529:203b-28: 'og nas kyang dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyu med la /
T02D2529:203b-29: gcig tu bsdus pa'i sgras bstan pas de rab tu smad par rig par bya'o //
T02D2529:203b-30: rdo rje'i khu tshur ni rdo rje mtshan ma'i khu tshur ro //
T02D2529:203b-31: dar dbyangs ni dar dkar po'i srid du khru nyi
T02D2529:203b-32: shu rtsa lnga la zheng du khru gang pa ste
T02D2529:203b-33: / des dbu rgyan gyi rtsa ru thod du yang
T02D2529:203b-34: dang yang bcings la rna ltag gnyis sor bzhi bzhi
T02D2529:203b-35: pa steng du mtho ba drangs nas lhag ma 'phyang
T02D2529:203b-36: bas byin par sleb par bya ba'i phyir dar dbyangs
T02D2529:203b-38: de dag rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan ni dngos su yang
T02D2529:203b-39: blangs la med pas ji ltar bstan pa'i ting nge
T02D2529:203b-40: 'dzin gyis so // chu'i dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02D2529:203b-41: ming dang bcas pa dngos po kho nar ro //
T02D2529:204a-0: yang sngags pa rab tu byung bas ni dbu @204a * //
T02D2529:204a-1: rgyan dang dar dbyangs dngos su mi blang ste /
T02D2529:204a-2: rab tu byung ba'i rtags yang dag par len to //
T02D2529:204a-3: khyim pa'i rtags spang ngo zhes smras pa dang 'gal bar spyod pas so //
T02D2529:204a-4: aom badzra aa dhi ba ti tvam aa bhi shinytsa
T02D2529:204a-5: mi tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba
T02D2529:204a-6: ni dril bu'i dbang bskur ba ste ;
T02D2529:204a-7: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
T02D2529:204a-8: shes rab sgra yi rjes 'gror bshad //
T02D2529:204a-9: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
T02D2529:204a-10: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D2529:204a-11: ces tshigs su bcad pa sngon du brjod pas so //
T02D2529:204a-12: de bzhin du rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba la yang
T02D2529:204a-13: tshigs su bcad pa'i mthar 'og nas rdo rje brtul
T02D2529:204a-15: gang zhig tu ni las yod la //
T02D2529:204a-16: las kyi cho ga med gyur pa //
T02D2529:204a-17: der ni spyi rgyud las grags pa'i //
T02D2529:204a-18: cho ga mkhas pas shes par bya //
T02D2529:204a-20: 'o na dril bu'i dbang bskur bar 'di ji ltar shes she na /
T02D2529:204a-21: gzhan du sngags 'di dril bu la sbyar bar mthong ba dang /
T02D2529:204a-22: dang po'i sgra yang dril bu ste //
T02D2529:204a-23: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin la de yang bdag po ste /
T02D2529:204a-24: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' tham cad kyi gtso bo dang /
T02D2529:204a-25: bdag po dang byed pa po dang pha lta bu dang ma lta bu'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:204a-26: gzhan yang rdo rje 'ba' zhig gi dbang bskur gyi
T02D2529:204a-27: dril bus ma yin par med pas slob dpon gyis
T02D2529:204a-28: gnyis ka bsdus te bstan to //
T02D2529:204a-29: de ltar na de ni rang la lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2529:204a-30: chen por lhag par gnas pas rang lhag par gnas
T02D2529:204a-31: pa'i rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya'o //
T02D2529:204a-32: lha gnas shing rta'i yan lag dang //
T02D2529:204a-33: mthu dang dbyibs na gnas pa'o //
T02D2529:204a-34: zhes bstan pas rang la zhen pa'am rang rgyas par
T02D2529:204a-35: bya ba'i cho ga la rang lhag par gnas pa'o
T02D2529:204a-36: zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi lugs te de la
T02D2529:204a-37: yang skyon brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D2529:204a-38: da ni 'dir rang lhag par gnas par bya ba
T02D2529:204a-39: 'di nyid legs par rdzogs shing yan lag tshang ba
T02D2529:204a-40: dang / ches mthu dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2529:204a-41: bdag nyid rdzogs par bya ba bstan pas /
T02D2529:204a-42: de'i go rims bsdus pa dran par bya ste /
T02D2529:204a-43: de la de ltar rang lhag par gnas pa la
T02D2529:204a-44: sogs pa byas nas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2529:204b-0: ni go rims @204b mtshams sbyar ba'o //
T02D2529:204b-1: rang lhag par gnas pa ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor chen por grub pa tsam yin la /
T02D2529:204b-2: sogs pa smos pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2529:204b-3: dang phyag rgya chen pos byin gyis brlab pa nas
T02D2529:204b-4: rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar du bsdus te de'i
T02D2529:204b-6: byas pa ni legs par rdzogs par byas te zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2529:204b-7: bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa ni kha cig phyag rgya
T02D2529:204b-8: bzhi dang phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor la yang
T02D2529:204b-10: mngon par byang chub pa dang dkyil 'khor rgyal po
T02D2529:204b-11: mchog dag bya'o zhes rtog pa srid pas de dgag
T02D2529:204b-12: ste / phyag rgya bsdus pa dag bsgom pa ni
T02D2529:204b-13: bdag nyid rdzogs pa lus la dkyil 'khor pa mi
T02D2529:204b-14: ste / dgos kyi / rang lhag par gnas pa
T02D2529:204b-15: yan lag dang bcas pa byas la bsgrub pa ste
T02D2529:204b-16: bzlas brjod la sogs pa bya'o zhes pa ste /
T02D2529:204b-17: 'og nas kyang yang na sngon bzhin du rnal 'byor
T02D2529:204b-18: chen po dang mchod pa la sogs pa byas la

T02D2529:205a-1: pa ste de ni dkyil 'khor de gcig pa can

T02D2529:205a-3: // dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang dbang bskur zhing

T02D2529:205a-5: rdzogs pa'i phyir slar gshegs su gsol bar rigs pas

T02D2529:205a-14: / snying po dang sngags kyang brjod cing sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus te /

T02D2529:205a-35: byin gyis brlab cing rin po che'i dgu rgyan dang

T02D2529:205b-0: @205b phyogs 'di la ni bdag lhag par gnas pa

T02D2529:205b-25: de ltar don bsdus te bstan nas /

T02D2529:205b-28: 'khor te zhes pa ni lha re re la zla

T02D2529:205b-37: // gzhan dag ni nam kha'i ngos de nyid las

T02D2529:205b-39: khyab pa'i phyir gang na yang bzhugs pa ji ltar

T02D2529:206a-1: 'khor sprul pa rgya chen po gzhal yas khang dang

T02D2529:206a-3: gar zla ba gcig la brtan par gyur pas na
T02D2529:206a-5: dpung gcig dang nags gcig ces pa bzhin no //

T02D2529:206a-14: par bya'o // rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas

T02D2529:206a-24: / sems rtog pa las brtsams nas ni //
T02D2529:206a-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //

T02D2529:206a-28: gnyis kyi tshig can ni gang yang rung ba'i don to //

T02D2529:206a-35: / chos thams cad rten cing 'brel pa tsam du ston pa dang /
T02D2529:206a-36: sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'i rtags

T02D2529:206a-38: rdo rje kha cig la bsgom par rnal 'byor gyi

T02D2529:206b-3: kyi tshig can ni sngon bzhin no //

T02D2529:206b-6: gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi ni sems dpa' chen po
T02D2529:206b-7: dang 'dra bar rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa

T02D2529:206b-23: phyir skyid de ba dag snying gar tsandan gyi lde

T02D2529:206b-25: // 'byung ba dang 'jug pa ni sgo bzhi nas

T02D2529:206b-32: // dag bzhag la / // 'dir mngon par yid
T02D2529:206b-33: ches pa'i rgyu mtshan 'tsham pa'i gnas su 'di dag
T02D2529:206b-34: sbyar gyi gang du bkod kyang dngos grub du byed

T02D2529:206b-37: 'tsham pa de nyid dngos grub kyi rgyur bsngags te bskyed par rung bas na'o //
T02D2529:207a-0: 'dir sangs rgyas lnga ni dbu rgyan du bzhugs @207a * //
T02D2529:207a-2: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa yang gnas
T02D2529:207a-3: bzhir byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs pas 'di dag la

T02D2529:207a-7: rang lhag par gnas pa ni ma yin no zhes zer ro //

T02D2529:207a-9: lhag par gnas pa ma byas na lha'i lus su

T02D2529:207a-13: phyag rgya gcig pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor la
T02D2529:207a-14: rnal 'byor chen po tsam bya bar ston pa na
T02D2529:207a-15: dkyil 'khor mi sgom par lus la dkyil 'khor dgod
T02D2529:207a-16: pa mi rigs shing lus lhar bya ba'i cho ga

T02D2529:207a-18: lha de lta bu de spang ngo //
T02D2529:207a-19: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab nas dngos grub

T02D2529:207a-28: sku la sogs pa gzhan gyi don te bdag dang
