T02D2529:207b-35: mya ngan 'das par rlom sems med //
T02D2529:207b-37: srid pa dang ni mya ngan 'das //
T02D2529:207b-38: 'di nyid yod pa ma yin te //
T02D2529:207b-39: srid pa yongs su shes pa ni //
T02D2529:207b-40: mya ngan 'das pa zhes bshad do //
T02D2529:207b-41: zhes pa'i tshul gyis srid pa nyid mchog tu grub ste /
T02D2529:207b-42: mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das par da lta
T02D2529:207b-43: nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T02D2529:207b-45: mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan 'das //
T02D2529:207b-46: bya byas pa yang de nyid do //
T02D2529:208a-0: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis @208a * //
T02D2529:208a-1: dag / ces bya ba la sogs par mos pa dang /
T02D2529:208a-2: rnal 'byor pa yang tshig de brjod cing de'i don
T02D2529:208a-3: la gzhol bas na thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug
T02D2529:208a-4: dam pa mchog gi chos shes par byed pa zhes
T02D2529:208a-5: dril bu'i bdag nyid chen po bstan to //
T02D2529:208a-6: dharma aa zhes pa dang h'um gi yi ge rdo
T02D2529:208a-7: rje'i sa bon gnyis 'dir kha dog dkar po ste
T02D2529:208a-8: / stong pa nyid las yig 'bru dang de las
T02D2529:208a-9: de dag ste ye shes kyi rang bzhin du grub
T02D2529:208a-10: / par bya ba'o // dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2529:208a-11: chen por lhag par gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2529:208a-12: dang po dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa na /
T02D2529:208a-13: 'dod chags bral ba lta bu'i sdig / ces pa
T02D2529:208a-14: nas ma h'a sa ma ya ha na h'um phat
T02D2529:208a-15: ces pa'i bar gyis gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dam
T02D2529:208a-16: tshig gnyer gtad pa ni dam tshig ste /
T02D2529:208a-17: dam tshig de'i phyag rgya chen po 'dod chags chen
T02D2529:208a-18: po la gnas pa'i rang bzhin 'khor los sgyur ba
T02D2529:208a-19: chas pa lta bu lhag par gnas par bya'i /
T02D2529:208a-20: nyan thos ltar lus sun 'byin cing myur du zhi ba'i dbyings su 'jug par mi bya'o //
T02D2529:208a-21: 'on de lta na srid pa'i bde ba la lhag
T02D2529:208a-22: par chags pas gnas par bya ba'am de lta na
T02D2529:208a-23: yang 'khor ba gcig pu bgrod par sems zhes pa'i
T02D2529:208a-26: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02D2529:208a-27: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2529:208a-28: srid pa la ni chags par rung ba'i bde ba
T02D2529:208a-29: med de yun thung ba dang gnod pa dang 'brel
T02D2529:208a-30: ba dang / rang bzhin gyis dman pas so //
T02D2529:208a-31: srid par skrag nas myur du mya ngan las 'da' bar mi rigs te /
T02D2529:208a-32: bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'byor pa las nyams par 'gyur bas so //
T02D2529:208a-33: de'i phyir sdug bsngal chen po dag pa'i phyir /
T02D2529:208a-34: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02D2529:208a-35: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par smos pa te /
T02D2529:208a-36: mngon par zhen pa mtha' dag dang bral ba sgyu
T02D2529:208a-37: ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i lha'i
T02D2529:208a-38: lus la mchod pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas tshim
T02D2529:208a-39: par byed cing bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pas
T02D2529:208a-40: dga' ba dang bde ba'i mchog gi ro myong ba
T02D2529:208a-41: dang mi 'bral bar lam bde bas bla na med
T02D2529:208a-43: sems can yal bar bor te rang 'ba' zhig zhi
T02D2529:208b-0: bar 'gro bar mi bya ba 'di ni @208b byang
T02D2529:208b-1: chub kyi sems dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
T02D2529:208b-2: mi gtong ba'i rgyu dam tshig gi rtsa ba yin
T02D2529:208b-3: pas 'di nyid dam tshig chen po'o //
T02D2529:208b-4: des kyang theg pa dman pa dang /
T02D2529:208b-5: srid pa chags pa ngan ba 'joms pas na ha na ste /
T02D2529:208b-6: dam tshig che po nyid kyis 'joms pa zhes bya'o //
T02D2529:208b-7: h'um phat ces pa ni de byin gyis brlab cing de la brtan par bya ba'i sngags so //
T02D2529:208b-8: thabs de ni ches 'thad pa de /
T02D2529:208b-9: snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can ma rungs
T02D2529:208b-10: ba dag kha cig srid pa kho na la dam
T02D2529:208b-11: por zhen pas de las dbral ba'i phyir ni sgyu
T02D2529:208b-12: ma lta bu'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dpe med
T02D2529:208b-13: par bde ba rgyas shing yun ring ba la longs
T02D2529:208b-15: kha cig srid pa me 'bar ba ltar shes shing
T02D2529:208b-16: thog ma med pa'i sdug bsngal brgyud ma dran pas
T02D2529:208b-17: skrag ste sems can 'dor ba la zhugs pa dag
T02D2529:208b-18: la yang / deng phan chad ci bder spyad pa
T02D2529:208b-19: sa 'khor ba las thar pas sngon lta bu'i sdug
T02D2529:208b-20: bsngal yang spyad mi dgos la /
T02D2529:208b-21: sems can yang btang mi dgos zhes bstan pas theg pa dman pa las nges par bzlog ste /
T02D2529:208b-22: gzhan du na kha cig ni 'khor ba las 'bral bar mi nus la /
T02D2529:208b-23: kha cig ni myur du mya ngan las 'da' bas theg pa chen po'i rigs zad par 'gyur ro//
T02D2529:208b-24: bden pa gnyis rnam par nges pa'i lam sbyin pa la sogs pas brgyan pa /
T02D2529:208b-25: shin tu nges shing slu ba med pa pha rol
T02D2529:208b-26: tu phyin pa'i lam de yang dus kyis gnod pa
T02D2529:208b-27: byas pa'i skye bo 'di dag shin tu 'phrod pa
T02D2529:208b-28: ma yin te / de las 'dod pa lnga bsten
T02D2529:208b-29: pa la sogs pa ni lan 'ga' snang zhing de
T02D2529:208b-30: dgag pa dang brtul zhugs dang sdom pa dag ni
T02D2529:208b-31: yang dang yang smos pas cung zad yid skrag par
T02D2529:208b-33: de'i phyir mchog tu thugs rje che ba'i de bzhin
T02D2529:208b-34: gshegs pas rtsod pa'i dus 'dir 'dul ba'i snod dang
T02D2529:208b-35: 'tsham par gsang sngags kyi theg pa bstan cing /
T02D2529:208b-36: dam tshig 'di lta bur bca' bar mdzad la /
T02D2529:208b-37: bya ba'i rgyud dag tu yang /
T02D2529:208b-38: sngags kyi thag pa skyed chen gyi //
T02D2529:208b-39: theg pa la ni ma mos pa //
T02D2529:208b-40: de dag bstan 'dir skal ba med //
T02D2529:208b-41: de dag nam yang mi gzung ngo //
T02D2529:208b-42: zhes bya ba'i tshig gis dbugs dbyung ba mdzad do//
T02D2529:209a-0: @209a * // 'dir thabs khyad par can gyi srid par gnas pa'i
T02D2529:209a-1: rgyu ni lam 'dir lha'i gzugs su bdag nyid bsgom
T02D2529:209a-3: gang phyir dam tshig phyag rgyar bshad //
T02D2529:209a-4: yid kyi lus ni brtan pa nyid //
T02D2529:209a-6: yid kyis bsgom pa'i lus ni yid kyi lus te /
T02D2529:209a-7: brtan pa ni sngags dang phyag rgya du mas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2529:209a-8: snying po byang chub kyi bar du yang der gnang ba ma btang bas so //
T02D2529:209a-9: de lta bu'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2529:209a-10: phyag rgya chen por lha'i rnal 'byor phyag rgya bzhis sngon bzhin rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2529:209a-11: de lta bu de ni theg pa mchog las mi
T02D2529:209a-12: nyams par 'dod pa dag gis 'da' bar bya ba
T02D2529:209a-13: ma yin pas de nyid dam tshig go //
T02D2529:209a-14: de ltar na gang gi phyir de rgyu mtshan 'di dag gis zhes pa'o //
T02D2529:209a-15: de ltar snying rje chen po mtshon pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D2529:209a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dran pa'i yan lag dril bu dang /
T02D2529:209a-17: thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pas 'khor ba ji
T02D2529:209a-18: srid du ji ltar dga' bar gnas pa'i dam tshig
T02D2529:209a-19: gi phyag rgya bsgom pa 'di ni rnal 'byor chen
T02D2529:209a-20: po bsgrub pa brtan zhing don yod par bya'o //
T02D2529:209a-21: de nas dril bu gsil zhing dam tshig gsum gyi glu nye bar sbyar te de ni 'di'o //
T02D2529:209a-22: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02D2529:209a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2529:209a-24: 'dir dam tshig gsum ni de kho na'i dam tshig
T02D2529:209a-25: dang chos kyi dam tshig dang dam tshig gi phyag
T02D2529:209a-27: de la de kho na'i dam tshig de yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2529:209a-28: rang bzhin gyi de kho na dang /
T02D2529:209a-29: dbang 'byor pa'i de kho na dang rnam par dag pa'i de kho na'o //
T02D2529:209a-30: de dag las dang por rang bzhin gyi de kho na'i dbang du byas nas ni /
T02D2529:209a-31: aom nam mkha' las byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:209a-32: dbang 'byor pa'i de kho na'i dbang du byas te ni /
T02D2529:209a-33: kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:209a-34: rnam par dag pa'i de kho na'i dbang du byas
T02D2529:209a-35: te yang nyes pa mi mnga' zhes bya ba la
T02D2529:209a-36: sogs pa'o // chos kyi dam tshig gi dbang du byas te ni /
T02D2529:209a-37: shin tu dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:209a-38: dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dbang du byas te ni /
T02D2529:209a-39: kun mchog ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:209b-0: de ltar glu de lta bu ni bdag @209b 'khor
T02D2529:209b-1: ba ji srid du gnas pa la de bzhin gshegs
T02D2529:209b-2: pa khyed kyis grogs mdzad ba bstan pa'i tshig gi
T02D2529:209b-3: don med do // de bzhin du gzhan dag sku bo //
T02D2529:209b-4: kha cig ni 'dir dam tshig ste lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D2529:209b-5: gzung nas de'i rjes su glu 'di sbyar bas na
T02D2529:209b-6: dam tshig dang 'brel ba'i glu zhes zer te ;
T02D2529:209b-7: de lta na gsum zhes bya ba ma brjod par 'gyur ro //
T02D2529:209b-8: gzhan dang rdo rje dang dril bu dang phyag rgya ste /
T02D2529:209b-9: de gsum ni dam tshig gsum yin la de gsum
T02D2529:209b-10: gzung nas glu 'di sbyar bas na dam tshig gsum
T02D2529:209b-11: dang 'brel ba'i glu zhes zer te /
T02D2529:209b-12: de lta na shugs kyis go bas 'brel ba bstan pa'i tshig gi don med do //
T02D2529:209b-13: de bzhin du gzhan dag sku gsung thugs zhes zer ba yang sgrub pa med pas gsal to //
T02D2529:209b-14: de ltar bdag nyid bsgrubs nas phyag rgya chen pos
T02D2529:209b-15: nam mkha'i phyogs su 'dug ste zhes bya ba la
T02D2529:209b-16: sogs pas rnam pa de snyed kyi rim gyis srid
T02D2529:209b-17: pa tha ma pa ltar byang chub chen po la
T02D2529:209b-18: mchog tu nye bar byas la /
T02D2529:209b-19: da ni bar chad med pa'i lam gyi ngo bo
T02D2529:209b-20: lnga ma mngon par byang chub par bsgom par ston
T02D2529:209b-21: te / 'di nyid rgyu'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2529:209b-22: de la nam mkha'i ngos ni ri rab kyi steng gi nam mkha'i phyogs te /
T02D2529:209b-23: dang po bsrung ba bsgom pas na der mos pa tsam gyis gnas pas so //
T02D2529:209b-24: rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang stong spyi phud 'di'o //
T02D2529:209b-25: de la dang po la gru bzhi la /
T02D2529:209b-26: gnyis po ni zlum po ste /
T02D2529:209b-27: de nas bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor te de'i steng du lam las sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2529:209b-28: yang de'i steng du bam las steng gi rgya mtsho ste /
T02D2529:209b-29: de'i dbus su ri rab bo //
T02D2529:209b-30: khongs su 'du ba thams cad ni yid tsam gyis mos par bya'o //
T02D2529:209b-31: sngon bzhin du zhes bya ba ni bsrung ba bsgo
T02D2529:209b-32: pa'i cho ga las 'og cing ba'i sngags sngon bzhin
T02D2529:209b-33: te / aom badzra dri dho me ba ra ksha sarbam sv'a h'a /
T02D2529:209b-35: / rdo rje bcings pas byin gyis brlab po zhes
T02D2529:209b-36: bya ba ni sngar rdo rje bcings pa brkyang ste
T02D2529:209b-37: sa la gzhag pas 'og bcing bar bya'o zhes bstan
T02D2529:209b-39: 'dir zhing yongs su sbyong ba yin la /
T02D2529:209b-40: bsrung ba rnam ni sngar rang gi ye shes kyi
T02D2529:210a-0: rnam par 'phrul bas bkod pa rnam par @210a *
T02D2529:210a-1: // dag pas sgyu ma lta bur 'grub pas 'di
T02D2529:210a-2: stong pa nyid du byin gyis brlab tu med pas
T02D2529:210a-3: da yang bsgom mi dgos so //
T02D2529:210a-4: 'on kyang gnas kyi gzhi ri rab de gsar du rnam par sprul bar byas pa dang /
T02D2529:210a-5: de la yang thags bzangs ris la sogs pa'i gnod pa chen po yod par bshad pas //
T02D2529:210a-6: rtog pa blang thabs pa 'byung ba srid pa dgag par 'og bcing ba 'ba' zhig kyang bya'o //
T02D2529:210a-7: dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste zhes bya ba la /
T02D2529:210a-8: 'dir dkyil 'khor chen por bsgoms na nges par mngon
T02D2529:210a-9: par byang chub pa lnga bsgom par sngar rdo rje
T02D2529:210a-10: sems dpa' la sogs pa bskyed dam /
T02D2529:210a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig sems dpar bskyed kyang
T02D2529:210a-12: rung ste 'dir rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su
T02D2529:210a-13: 'dug la rnam par snang mdzad du gyur par bya'o
T02D2529:210a-15: bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
T02D2529:210a-16: mngon du bya ba ni khams gsum char la 'dod
T02D2529:210a-17: chags dang bral ba byas la /
T02D2529:210a-18: de nas mngon par byang chub pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:210a-19: 'dir thod rgal gyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T02D2529:210a-20: de'i 'og tu yang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i chung ngu'i du la snyoms par 'jug cing /
T02D2529:210a-21: de nas yid kyi lus kyis 'og min gyi khang
T02D2529:210a-22: par bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis ngas par
T02D2529:210a-23: 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' don thams cad grub
T02D2529:210a-24: pa'i gzugs su bdag nyid bskyed par bsams te /
T02D2529:210a-25: sngar ngan song ba thar par byas pa'i dus dang /
T02D2529:210a-26: 'di gnyi gar yang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum
T02D2529:210a-27: gyis nges par byung ba smos pa ni gnyi ga
T02D2529:210a-28: yang sa bcu pa'i dbang phyug tu 'dra bas na
T02D2529:210a-29: ste / 'on kyang der ni tha mal ba yin la /
T02D2529:210a-30: 'dir skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang /
T02D2529:210a-31: srid pa tha ma pa lta bu dang /
T02D2529:210a-32: byang chub kyi snying po la 'khod pa dag ni
T02D2529:210a-33: sa bcu pa'i mchog tu gyur par rig par bya'o
T02D2529:210a-34: // da ni 'dir snga ma dang phyi ma gi go rims dran par bya ste /
T02D2529:210a-35: dang po gnas nges par bya ste /
T02D2529:210a-36: de nas zhing yongs su sbyangs la /
T02D2529:210a-37: gnas bsrung ba dang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang gdan bsgom te /
T02D2529:210b-0: dbus su bdag nyid 'dug nas khams gong ma gnyis kyi ting nge @210b 'dzin bskyed de /
T02D2529:210b-1: 'og min du gnas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar rigs lnga'i dam tshig la zhugs te /
T02D2529:210b-2: ting nge 'dzin mkha' khyab la snyoms par zhugs la /
T02D2529:210b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i lung la brten nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga bskyed de /
T02D2529:210b-4: de byin gyis brlab ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad lus la bcug cing /
T02D2529:210b-5: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pas gnas bzhir byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2529:210b-6: rigs lnga go 'phang la gnas pas dbang bskur ba mnos te /
T02D2529:210b-7: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas kyang gnas bzhir byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2529:210b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhis bskor te ri rab kyi rtse mor bzhugs par bya'o zhes bya'o //
T02D2529:210b-9: de la 'dir kha cig na re dkon mchog gsum
T02D2529:210b-10: dran pa'i sngon du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2529:210b-11: kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ting gi gang
T02D2529:210b-12: bu bzhin du yongs su gang ngo zhes bya ba
T02D2529:210b-13: 'di la don med pas dag lhag par brjod do
T02D2529:210b-14: // yang gal te dang po nas de bzhin gshegs
T02D2529:210b-15: pa de dag byon nas sems dpa' chen po 'di
T02D2529:210b-16: yang mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa
T02D2529:210b-17: las bzlog nas mngon par byang chub pa ston par
T02D2529:210b-18: mi 'dor ro zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2529:210b-19: rigs lnga'i dam tshig la 'jug pa 'di la dgos
T02D2529:210b-20: pa med de sngar dam tshig bzung zin pas 'dir
T02D2529:210b-21: de dra pa la dgos pa khyad par med do
T02D2529:210b-22: zhes zer la / gzhan yang mngon par byang chub
T02D2529:210b-23: pa lnga'i dus su dang po ni mthong ba'i lam
T02D2529:210b-24: zhes zer la / yin la / gnyis pa ni bsgom pa'i lam ste /
T02D2529:210b-25: gsum pa dang bzhi pa ni bar chad med pa'i lam la ;
T02D2529:210b-26: lnga pa ni mthar phyin pa'i lam yin pa las /
T02D2529:210b-27: slob dpon gyis rnam par dbyi ba med pa kho
T02D2529:210b-28: nar smos pas 'dir gzung bar bya ba med pas
T02D2529:210b-29: skabs 'dir legs par ma bstan to zhes zer ro
T02D2529:210b-30: // de ni dam pa ma yin te dang po
T02D2529:210b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa kho na'i spyan sngar
T02D2529:210b-32: rigs lnga'i dam tshig brtan por dam bca' bas de
T02D2529:210b-33: bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mngon par byang chub
T02D2529:210b-34: pa'i man ngag bstan pa'i bskal pa bar du byed
T02D2529:210b-35: // pa ste / gdul bya 'byung bar 'gyur ba
T02D2529:210b-36: dag kyang dam tshig la lhag par nan tan byed
T02D2529:210b-37: pa lta na bla mas man ngag bstan gyi gzhan
T02D2529:211a-1: yin no zhes kyang bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:211a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas byon te /
T02D2529:211a-3: sems dpa' chen po de kho na la lung 'bogs
T02D2529:211a-4: pa'i phyir 'dus kyang dus la gzigs pas da dung
T02D2529:211a-5: mngon par byang chub par mi ston te /
T02D2529:211a-6: mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis byang chub mngon
T02D2529:211a-7: par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya bar mi nus
T02D2529:211a-8: pa dang / de'i 'og tu gdod lam sbyin pa
T02D2529:211a-9: ni ting nge 'dzin de la dam par lta ba
T02D2529:211a-10: dag bzlog par 'gyur gyi gzhan du na mngon par
T02D2529:211a-11: byang chub pa'i lam gyis rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba
T02D2529:211a-12: ltar mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis kyang 'tshang
T02D2529:211a-13: rgya bar nus pas mthu 'dra'o zhes de la mngon
T02D2529:211a-14: par zhen pa mi ldog par 'gyur bas so //
T02D2529:211a-15: des na de la nyes pa mi brjod do //
T02D2529:211a-16: rigs lnga'i dam tshig la 'jug pa yang don che ste /
T02D2529:211a-17: sngar brjod pa ltar bstan par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang snod du gzigs pa dang /
T02D2529:211a-18: gdul bya 'byung bar 'gyur ba la yang phan par
T02D2529:211a-19: 'gyur ba dang rang bzhin gyis kyang blo chen po
T02D2529:211a-20: can dag don chen po bsgrub par nye bar gnas
T02D2529:211a-21: pa na de sgrub pa'i rgyud ma bcas pa lhag
T02D2529:211a-23: mi phyed par dam pa bca' ste /
T02D2529:211a-24: dgos pa sgrub pa la mkhas rnams sran thub pas dka' ba rnams kyang dka' ba med par rgyal //
T02D2529:211a-26: mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga'i rnam par
T02D2529:211a-27: bstan pa ni slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas rtsa
T02D2529:211a-28: ba'i rgyud kyi bshad pa de kho na snang ba'i
T02D2529:211a-29: nang du re re nas ye shes lnga'i dbang du
T02D2529:211a-31: de nyid kyi don go bas 'dir yang rgyud kyi
T02D2529:211a-32: tshig rim pa ma bstan pas 'di la yang nyes
T02D2529:211a-33: pa med do // gang dag mngon par byang chub
T02D2529:211a-34: pa dang po ni 'jig rten las 'das pa don
T02D2529:211a-35: dam pa byang chub kyi sems mthong bas mthong ba'i
T02D2529:211a-36: pa med do // lam ste / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du yang snang la /
T02D2529:211a-37: nges 'byed yan lag dang mthong ba'i //
T02D2529:211a-38: lam dang bsgom pa'i lam nyid la //
T02D2529:211a-39: yang dang yang du sems pa dang //
T02D2529:211a-40: 'jal dang nges rtog bsgom pa'i lam //
T02D2529:211a-41: zhes bya ba'i lus kyis bsgom pa'i lam ni mtshan
T02D2529:211a-42: nyid med kyi lam snga ma nyid goms par byed
T02D2529:211a-43: pas na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snga ma nyid cher
T02D2529:211a-44: 'phel ba ste snga ma ni tshes gcig pa'i rnam
T02D2529:211b-0: @211b pa lta bu la 'di nya gang ba lta
T02D2529:211b-1: bu'o // de nas bsgom pa'i lam de nyid rab
T02D2529:211b-2: tu bstan te skad cig kho nas sgrib pa gnyis
T02D2529:211b-3: phra ba'i phra ba yan chad sel bas sangs rgyas
T02D2529:211b-4: kyi sa'i sgrib pa 'joms pa rdo rje lta bu'i
T02D2529:211b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo dang po ni rdo
T02D2529:211b-7: de'i mthar thug la ni rdo rje'i nga rgyal bya ba ste ;
T02D2529:211b-8: 'di rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos kyi sku brnyes nas /
T02D2529:211b-9: de'i mthu las gzugs kyi sku 'byung ba mngon par byang chub pa tha ma ste /
T02D2529:211b-10: ji ltar 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u las /
T02D2529:211b-11: rgyal ba chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba //
T02D2529:211b-12: gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chung nas /
T02D2529:211b-13: gzugs sku bzang po mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis //
T02D2529:211b-14: 'gro ba ma lus bkang zhing ston par mdzad //
T02D2529:211b-16: des na dang po zla ba tshes gcig pa nas
T02D2529:211b-17: bzung ba'i bar 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D2529:211b-19: gzhan dag ni rdo rje rtse mo las zla ba'i
T02D2529:211b-20: dkyil 'khor chen po gnyis pa zhes 'byung bas zla
T02D2529:211b-21: ba gnyis ka nya gang ba'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2529:211b-22: gzhan dag ni gdul bya'i dor zla ba la sogs pa bstan kyang /
T02D2529:211b-23: rang bzhin gyis mngon par byang chub pa la mtshan
T02D2529:211b-24: mar snang ba de dag med do zhes zer ro
T02D2529:211b-25: // slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas ni ye shes
T02D2529:211b-26: lnga'i rgyur bstan pas mngon par byang chub pa lnga
T02D2529:211b-27: bkod cing mi bskyod pa la sogs pas byin gyis
T02D2529:211b-29: mdor bsdus na gsang sngags kyi lam 'di ni khyad
T02D2529:211b-30: par gyi lam gyi bar du yang bla ma las
T02D2529:211b-31: 'thob kyi rang gis ma yin no zhes khong du
T02D2529:211b-32: chud par bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa de yang sngar
T02D2529:211b-33: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis nges par 'byung
T02D2529:211b-34: ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang 'dra bar 'gyur nas
T02D2529:211b-35: da 'dir mthong ba'i lam nas brtsams te /
T02D2529:211b-36: lam bsgom pa ni ches 'dod par bya ba ma yin pas na /
T02D2529:211b-37: ye shes lnga dang sbyar ba 'di nyid mchog go //
T02D2529:211b-38: gang yang rgyud dang mdo sde de dag de dag
T02D2529:211b-39: las mngon par byang chub pa'i lam mi 'dra ba
T02D2529:211b-40: rnam pa mang po bstan pa de dag thams cad
T02D2529:211b-41: kyang gdul bya'i bsam pa'i bye brag la brten pa
T02D2529:211b-42: kho na ste rang gi mtshan nyid pa'i mngon par
T02D2529:211b-43: byang chub pa ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha
T02D2529:212a-1: // zhar la 'ongs pas chog gi rnal ma dpyad
T02D2529:212a-2: de dang po dkon mchog gsum dran pa ni de
T02D2529:212a-3: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig go //
T02D2529:212a-4: de nas byams pa dang snying rje dang /
T02D2529:212a-5: 'og nas sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog grub pa'i phyir zhes pa dang /
T02D2529:212a-6: dga' ba dang btang snyoms ni sdom pa thams cad ces pa dang /
T02D2529:212a-7: mchod pa'i las zhes bya bas las kyi rigs so //
T02D2529:212a-8: rigs lhag ma rnams kyi dam tshig ni gsal lo //
T02D2529:212a-9: tshul thams cad nye bar bstan pa ni phyi rol
T02D2529:212a-10: pa'i lung yang bsdus te thams cad du gtogs pa
T02D2529:212a-11: dang / rang gi lugs kyis kyang de dpyad pa dang ldan pas so //
T02D2529:212a-12: sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgo ni theg pa chen po nyid kyi khyad par te /
T02D2529:212a-13: de sngon du bya ba ni sngar dam bcas pa de bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo zhes so //
T02D2529:212a-14: mkha' khyab kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
T02D2529:212a-15: so zhes bya ba la ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ngo
T02D2529:212a-17: ci'i phyir 'di la snyoms par 'jug /'di nyid kho na'i 'bras bu ni ci zhe na /
T02D2529:212a-18: de dag brjod par bya ste /
T02D2529:212a-19: ting nge 'dzin gang gis shin tu stong pa nyid
T02D2529:212a-20: la zhugs nas snang ba'i phreng ba ma lus pa
T02D2529:212a-21: gsal te / ji srid nam mkha'i mthas klas pa
T02D2529:212a-22: shin tu stong pa skyes bu mig btsums pa'i mig
T02D2529:212a-23: gi lam du gzugs thams cad chad cing mi 'jug
T02D2529:212a-24: pa lta bu ni 'di'i ngo bo ste /
T02D2529:212a-25: g-yo ba med la dran pa dang yid bde ba
T02D2529:212a-26: thams cad chad pas rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
T02D2529:212b-0: pa nyid thabs mkhas pa dang @212b bral ba'o //
T02D2529:212b-1: gang dag 'di rnal 'byor spyod pa rnam pa med
T02D2529:212b-2: pa'i grub pa'i mtha'o zhes zer ba ni mi 'dod
T02D2529:212b-3: de / de dag ni rnam pa mi 'dod kyis
T02D2529:212b-4: kyang 'phags pa so so rang rig pa rang bzhin
T02D2529:212b-5: gyis 'od gsal ba mtha' yas par khyab pa mkhas
T02D2529:212b-6: pas ni 'di dang mthun pa ma yin no //
T02D2529:212b-7: 'di la ci'i phyir snyoms par 'jug ce na /
T02D2529:212b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg par ni rnam pa
T02D2529:212b-9: thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid
T02D2529:212b-10: ma rtogs na nyi tshe'i stong pa dang /
T02D2529:212b-11: chad par byed pa'i rnam pa sun 'byin pa'i stong
T02D2529:212b-12: pas mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir
T02D2529:212b-13: la 'dir ni gtso bor bla ma'i drin gyis ma
T02D2529:212b-14: bskyangs na rang gi shes pa'i mthus ni lam khyad
T02D2529:212b-15: par can mi rtogs so zhes bla ma la gus
T02D2529:212b-18: nyer 'gro dang ni sangs rgyas te //
T02D2529:212b-19: nga la slob dpon su yang med //
T02D2529:212b-20: ces gsungs shing rang byung gi ye shes zhes pa bya ba'ang gsungs la /
T02D2529:212b-21: rang sangs rgyas kyang rang gi shes pas 'bras bu thob na /
T02D2529:212b-22: sngags kyi lam 'dir cis na bla ma la rag las pa gtsor byed ce na /
T02D2529:212b-23: lam 'dir ni shin tu mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i bya ba dang /
T02D2529:212b-24: shin tu sbyang bar dka' ba'i bya ba bud med
T02D2529:212b-25: bsten pa la sogs pa yang dang yang bstan te
T02D2529:212b-26: / de dag bstan pa med par ni theg pa
T02D2529:212b-27: chen po 'di la 'dun pa ches nyung bar 'gyur
T02D2529:212b-28: / zhing / de dag kyang de kho na ltar
T02D2529:212b-29: sgra ji bzhin du spyad par bya ba ma yin
T02D2529:212b-30: pas na dang po 'di la gzhug cing zhugs nas
T02D2529:212b-31: sgra ji bzhin pa'i lam gyis yongs su nyams pa
T02D2529:212b-32: / zhing / dgag pa'i phyir / ches thabs dam
T02D2529:212b-33: pa ston pa'i bla ma la rag las par rigs
T02D2529:212b-34: te dge slong gi dngos po rnyed nas gnas bzhir
T02D2529:212b-36: ting nge 'dzin 'di'i 'bras bu ni dam par gyur pa ci yang med do //
T02D2529:212b-37: dngos po'i stobs kyis ma zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:212b-38: de yang dngos po ni rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2529:212b-39: rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid du rnam par gnas la /
T02D2529:212b-40: de'i blo ni rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid la zhugs pas so //
T02D2529:213a-0: lhag ma rnams kyi tshig gi don @213a * //
T02D2529:213a-2: gzhan gyi don du dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i dang por
T02D2529:213a-3: cho ga de snyed kyis bdag nyid yang dag par
T02D2529:213a-4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su grub par bya ba'i rnal
T02D2529:213a-5: 'byor rab tu rgyas pa 'di yin pas na dang
T02D2529:213a-6: po'i rnal 'byor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to
T02D2529:213a-8: de tsam gyis bdag gi don phun sum tshogs par 'grub par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2529:213a-9: da ni bdag gi don ji lta bar grub nas
T02D2529:213a-10: dpe med pa'i 'khor dang gnas kyi longs spyod bkod
T02D2529:213a-11: pa bstan pa sngon du 'gro bas pha rol tu
T02D2529:213a-12: phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid la
T02D2529:213a-13: mchog tu gzhol ba rnams dang /
T02D2529:213a-14: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas srid pas skyo zhing yid byung ba rnams dang /
T02D2529:213a-15: mu stegs byed phyugs lta bu lam ngan pa la gnas pa dag dang /
T02D2529:213a-16: kha cig lha dang mi'i 'byor pa la lhag par
T02D2529:213a-17: chags nas srid pa la gyen du 'byung bar mi
T02D2529:213a-18: rtsol ba dag la lha dang mi las yang dag
T02D2529:213a-19: par 'das pa'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug byin gyis
T02D2529:213a-20: brlabs pas / de dag gis bde ba chen po
T02D2529:213a-21: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'dod chags dang bral ba
T02D2529:213a-22: dag kyang yid 'phrog par byed pa 'dir mngon par
T02D2529:213a-23: dga' bzhin du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo
T02D2529:213a-24: brlabs pas / dang / blon po dang /
T02D2529:213a-27: rtse dgod dang bcas pa'i nang gi longs spyod dang /
T02D2529:213a-28: dpe med pa'i gnas dang rgyan bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sbrul pa bstan te /
T02D2529:213a-29: 'dir bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ni chos kyi rgyal po'o //
T02D2529:213a-30: de bzhin gshegs ma pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa ni blon po chen po lta bu'o //
T02D2529:213a-31: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa bzhin ni btsun mo dam pa lta bu'o //
T02D2529:213a-32: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa bzhi ni sras rgyal tshab la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:213a-33: rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa ni blon po'i
T02D2529:213a-34: chung ma ste rgyal po'i 'bangs ma dam pa rnams
T02D2529:213a-35: so // rdo rje me tog la sogs pa ni g-yog mo dam pa rnams so ;
T02D2529:213a-36: / rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa ni rtse dgod pa rnams so //
T02D2529:213a-37: gzhan yang phyi rol gyi 'khor sa'i snam bu la
T02D2529:213a-38: mtha' yas par mchod pas lag pa sbrel cing glu
T02D2529:213a-39: len la / rdo rje'i gar byed pa'i lha mo
T02D2529:213a-40: bud med rin po che zil gyis gnon pa rnams
T02D2529:213b-0: kyis skad cig kyang 'bral mi nus par dga' @213b
T02D2529:213b-1: bar byed la yid 'phrog pa'i lha mo dang /
T02D2529:213b-7: rnga yab dkar po nor bu dang gser gyi yu
T02D2529:213b-8: ba can dang me long dang mu tig gi do
T02D2529:213b-9: shal dang do shal phyed pa dang mu tig dmar
T02D2529:213b-10: po'i sham bu dang dpe med bar dri zhim pa'i
T02D2529:213b-11: bdug pa dang dri dang lha'i las 'das pa'i bdud
T02D2529:213b-12: rtsi'i bye brag sna tshogs pa'i bza' ba dang btung
T02D2529:213b-13: ba dang bca' ba dang myang ba dang bldag pa
T02D2529:213b-14: dang / gzhib pa thams cad kha dog dang dri
T02D2529:213b-15: dang ro dang reg pa phun sum tshogs pas gang
T02D2529:213b-16: dang / ba / lha'i tshogs de dag kyang phan
T02D2529:213b-17: chun phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan gyis dgyes shing
T02D2529:213b-18: 'dzum pa zag pa med pa'i bde ba dpe med
T02D2529:213b-19: pa nyams su myong bas bzhugs pa ste /
T02D2529:213b-20: de ni 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das dang po gsang
T02D2529:213b-21: sngags kyi lam du sems bskyed pa nas brtsams te
T02D2529:213b-22: yun ring zhig tu dkyil 'khor chen por snang ba
T02D2529:213b-23: lta bu'i mchod pa byas shing ting nge 'dzin de
T02D2529:213b-24: lta bu yang yun shin tu ring bar goms par
T02D2529:213b-25: byas pas / de'i 'bras bu grub pa la longs spyod pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:213b-26: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pas ni
T02D2529:213b-27: byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs
T02D2529:213b-28: pa yang lam bde ba 'dir mos par byas la
T02D2529:213b-29: 'dod pa'i lha'i rgyal po yang byang chub tu sems
T02D2529:213b-30: bskyed cing 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal po ka pi
T02D2529:213b-31: ni yang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la bkod ces
T02D2529:213b-32: grags pas / don chen po 'di lta bu'i phyir yang 'di bstan to //
T02D2529:213b-33: de la 'dir go rims kyi don ni dang po'i
T02D2529:213b-34: rnal 'byor byas ma thag tu lha rnams kyi gnas
T02D2529:213b-35: su gdan zla ba bsams la /
T02D2529:213b-36: de'i 'og tu mtshan ma spros te de yongs su
T02D2529:213b-37: gyur pa las sems dpa' chen po de dang de
T02D2529:213b-38: la sogs pa'i gzugs su gyur pas thugs ka nas
T02D2529:213b-39: ched du brjod pa smra zhing /
T02D2529:213b-40: de'i 'og tu dbang bskur ba'i mthar yang ched du brjod pa smra bar blta ste /
T02D2529:213b-42: de la de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
T02D2529:213b-43: mas gnas bzhir bdag nyid la byin gyis brlabs la
T02D2529:213b-44: zhes bya ba ni sngar dang po'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2529:214a-0: 'dir bstan pa ni dang po rnal 'byor byas ma thag tu @214a * //
T02D2529:214a-1: dkyil 'khor spro ba yang 'jug par bya'o zhes bar ma chad par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:214a-2: rang gi snying gar son pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ni /
T02D2529:214a-3: snying ga'i gnas su bla mas rdo rje phab pa ste /
T02D2529:214a-4: brjod pa gnyis sngon bzhin no //
T02D2529:214a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad da ni rnam par snang mdzad nyid do //
T02D2529:214a-6: de nyid la sngar de bzhin gshegs pa zhugs pas so //
T02D2529:214a-7: gzhan dag ni rang gi rigs kyi gdan rang rang
T02D2529:214a-8: gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs ka nas spros pa
T02D2529:214a-9: thams cad kyi sgras sangs rgyas lnga gzung zhes zer
T02D2529:214a-10: ro // de nas de dag la byams pa la
T02D2529:214a-11: sogs pas ni sems dpa' chen po re re thams
T02D2529:214a-12: cad kyi bdag nyid du bstan pa'i phyir phan tshun
T02D2529:214a-14: tshad chen po'i rdo rje bsgom pa ni yang dag
T02D2529:214a-15: par na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2529:214a-16: chen po'i mthu'i 'phrul pa sems dpa'i rdo rje snang
T02D2529:214a-17: bas 'di chos kyi sku las byung bar bstan pa'o
T02D2529:214a-18: // yang thugs kar son pa'i rdo rje'i tshad nyid
T02D2529:214a-19: du gyur zhes pa ni rang gi lus 'byung ba
T02D2529:214a-20: dang 'tsham pa'i rgyur byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2529:214a-21: gzugs kyi lus ni nam mkha'i gtos thams cad khyab par dmigs par mi nus pas so //
T02D2529:214a-22: rang gi lag tu gnas par bsam pa ni 'di
T02D2529:214a-23: dag bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag ltar gnas te skyes
T02D2529:214a-24: bu'i lag pa g-yas pa ltar dgos pa thams cad
T02D2529:214a-25: byed par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2529:214a-26: thugs kar gyur pa'i rdo rje la zhugs pa ni
T02D2529:214a-27: de ni phyi rol gyi lus ma yin te de
T02D2529:214a-28: bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs nyid do zhes bstan pa'o //
T02D2529:214a-29: cho ga 'di dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor gyi lha
T02D2529:214a-30: ji snyed pa ni rang gi ye shes kyi rnam
T02D2529:214a-31: par 'phrul pa'o zhes bstan pas rgyud gzhan du 'dzin
T02D2529:214a-33: sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur bas kyang
T02D2529:214a-34: mngon par dbang bskur te zhes bya ba la 'di
T02D2529:214a-35: dag ni rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su
T02D2529:214a-37: rigs re re yang rigs lnga lnga dang mtshungs par
T02D2529:214a-38: ldan pas na rigs lnga'i bdag pos dbu brgyan par
T02D2529:214a-39: bya'o // gang du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
T02D2529:214a-40: rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang bskur ba der
T02D2529:214b-0: bya'o // ni / de @214b dag la khams gsum
T02D2529:214b-1: pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba'i phul ba'i
T02D2529:214b-2: rtags kyis mtshan pa yin la /
T02D2529:214b-3: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la
T02D2529:214b-4: sogs pa la rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis dbang
T02D2529:214b-5: bskur ba yang / de dag ni thams cad kyang
T02D2529:214b-6: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa kho na yin la
T02D2529:214b-7: bskur ba yang / / skye ba gcig gis thogs
T02D2529:214b-8: pa dag la ni nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2529:214b-9: dbu rgyan nyid gnang bas de nyid rigs te /
T02D2529:214b-10: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas dga' ldan
T02D2529:214b-11: du nyid kyi dbu rgyan phung nas byang chub sems
T02D2529:214b-12: dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i mgo la gzhag
T02D2529:214b-13: go zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2529:214b-14: bla na med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs te de
T02D2529:214b-15: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D2529:214b-16: ye shes kyi bar du mngon phar rdzogs par byang
T02D2529:214b-17: chub par sgrub par byed pa dang po'i rdo rje
T02D2529:214b-18: dang / dang po'i rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dril bu
T02D2529:214b-19: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bla na med
T02D2529:214b-20: pa'i tshul khrims la sogs pa ni tshul khrims kyi
T02D2529:214b-21: dang / phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang /
T02D2529:214b-22: shes rab kyi phung po dang /
T02D2529:214b-23: rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
T02D2529:214b-24: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po
T02D2529:214b-25: zhes bya ba mi slob pa'i phung po lnga ste
T02D2529:214b-26: / de dag dgra bcom pa la sogs pa yang
T02D2529:214b-27: yod pas de gsal ba'i phyir bla na med pa
T02D2529:214b-28: / smos te / sangs rgyas kyi sas bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2529:214b-29: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sa'i chos thams cad
T02D2529:214b-30: bsdu bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam
T02D2529:214b-31: pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi bar du mngon par
T02D2529:214b-32: rdzogs bar byang chub pa zhes so //
T02D2529:214b-33: de sgrub par byed pa ni dbang bskur ba ste /
T02D2529:214b-34: de yang dang po'i rdo rje ste de bzhin gshegs
T02D2529:214b-35: pa'i rdo rje dang des mtshan pa'i dril bu la
T02D2529:214b-37: phyogs 'dis ni sems dpa' chen po dag la mos
T02D2529:214b-38: pa'i gang zag dga' bar byas pa yang blta ste
T02D2529:214b-39: ; de dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du bsgrub pas so //
T02D2529:214b-40: ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams 'grub pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2529:214b-41: kun du bzang po'i phyir sbyin zhes gnyis ka bzhi pa'i mtha' bstan pa ni /
T02D2529:215a-0: dbang bskur ba de dag gis sems dpa' @215a * //
T02D2529:215a-1: chen po de'i bdag dang gzhan gyi don 'grub par bstan pa'o //
T02D2529:215a-2: ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa zhas bya
T02D2529:215a-3: ba la sogs pa smos pas ni rjes su gnang
T02D2529:215a-4: ba dang lung bstan pa dag tu bsdu'o //
T02D2529:215a-5: gzhan dag ni 'di la lung bstan pa mi 'dod de rjes su gnang ba tsam zhes zer ro //
T02D2529:215a-6: lung bstan pa khas blangs ba la nyes pa med
T02D2529:215a-7: de tha dad pa med kyang sems can gyi don
T02D2529:215a-8: du tha dad par bstan nas nam zhig na de
T02D2529:215a-9: yang rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D2529:215a-10: por 'gyur zhes thabs mkhas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis te
T02D2529:215a-11: 'di legs so // gzhan dag dang po chu'i dbang
T02D2529:215a-12: bskur ba 'dir sogs pa'i sgra smos pas bsdus zhes
T02D2529:215a-13: 'di legs so // zer ro // de ni mi
T02D2529:215a-14: 'dod de tha mar bstan pas dang por bya ba
T02D2529:215a-15: bsdu ba ni ha cang khyab ches pa'i phyir dang
T02D2529:215a-16: 'di legs so // zer ro // / chu'i dbang
T02D2529:215a-17: bskur ba ni shugs kyis rtogs te gang du yang
T02D2529:215a-18: bum pa med par dbang bskur ba mi 'tsham la
T02D2529:215a-20: pa yang chus ma bkang ba'i stong pas min zhes
T02D2529:215a-21: 'jig rten gyi lugs nyid la ltos pas so //
T02D2529:215a-22: cho ga de dag ni sems dpa' lhag ma rnams la yang blta'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ni /
T02D2529:215a-23: de ltar skyes pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2529:215a-24: bskyed pa ni zla ba dang rdo rje chen po dang /
T02D2529:215a-27: spro ba ni de dag las 'od zer rnams so //
T02D2529:215a-28: bsdu ba ni slar de dag nyid la'o //
T02D2529:215a-30: spro ba'i gnas dang bsdu ba'i gnas //
T02D2529:215a-31: zhes sbyar te rdo rje rnam pa gnyis po dag
T02D2529:215a-32: ni spro ba dang bsdu ba gnyis ka'i gnas so
T02D2529:215a-33: // sems dpa'i lus ni bsdu ba'i gnas so //
T02D2529:215a-34: de dag brtan par bsgom pa ni sems mi g-yeng bar bya ba ste /
T02D2529:215a-35: de dag ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi bar du blta'o zhes sbyar ro //
T02D2529:215a-36: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa ni lugs
T02D2529:215a-37: gzhan yin pas de nas mi bskyod pa'i nga rgyal
T02D2529:215a-38: gyis sems ma rdo rje ma bsgrub po zhes bya
T02D2529:215a-40: bdag nyid dbus na gnas pa'i 'du shes gtad pas
T02D2529:215a-41: dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs
T02D2529:215a-42: pa la mchod pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di lta
T02D2529:215b-0: ji ltar dang po rgyud kyi sems dpa' @215b 'byung
T02D2529:215b-1: ba'i bshad pa'i rjes su 'brang zhes pa'i don to
T02D2529:215b-2: // 'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po yin pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po ste /
T02D2529:215b-3: 'dir dbang bskur na rigs lhag ma rnams dang rang
T02D2529:215b-4: gi gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa yang dbang
T02D2529:215b-6: / de nyid kyi phyir na mchog ste dam pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2529:215b-7: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de bshad
T02D2529:215b-8: pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la mos par
T02D2529:215b-10: 'dir dkyil 'khor dang lha'i de kho na nyid legs
T02D2529:215b-11: par khong du chud pas dkyil 'khor 'di lta bu
T02D2529:215b-12: bsgoms na 'bras bu rab tu mthu can du 'gyur
T02D2529:215b-14: de dag kyang rgyud kyi 'grel bar rgya cher bstan pas de khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2529:215b-15: de ltar gzhan gyi don byed pa dang shin tu
T02D2529:215b-16: 'tsham pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bkod
T02D2529:215b-17: pa bstan nas / da ni 'dir gzhan gyi don
T02D2529:215b-18: la ji ltar 'jug pa gzhan gyi don gyi phrin
T02D2529:215b-19: las la dkyil 'khor pa rnams gzhag pa bstan pa'i
T02D2529:215b-20: pa bstan nas / phyir / de nas rnam par
T02D2529:215b-21: snang mdzad dang bdag nyid lhan cig dbyer med par
T02D2529:215b-22: rnam par bsams la bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba
T02D2529:215b-24: 'ga' zhig rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i rnal
T02D2529:215b-25: 'byor pa yin na des mngon par byang chub pa
T02D2529:215b-26: bstan te / dkyil 'khor sbrul nas slar de'i rnal
T02D2529:215b-27: 'byor gyis tha dad par gnas pa srid cing de
T02D2529:215b-28: bzhin gshegs pa'i rnal 'byor can yang tha dad par
T02D2529:215b-29: gnas pas na 'dir lhan cig tha mi dad pa
T02D2529:215b-30: bstan te / smos te / de la 'jug ces pa'i don to //
T02D2529:215b-31: bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bstan pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02D2529:215b-32: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thugs dam gyi dbang
T02D2529:215b-33: gis nges par 'khor dang bcas pa byon pas na
T02D2529:215b-34: / de nas 'dus te byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2529:215b-35: pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang
T02D2529:215b-37: de dag kyang rnal 'byor pa dkyil 'khor gyi bdag
T02D2529:215b-38: por gyur pa la phyag 'tshal zhing bstod pa ni
T02D2529:215b-39: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2529:216a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang mdzad khyod nyid de bzhin gshegs @216a * //
T02D2529:216a-1: pa thams cad do zhes pa'o //
T02D2529:216a-2: ae ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bstod pa ste /
T02D2529:216a-3: ae ni spro bar ston pa'o //
T02D2529:216a-4: gang la yid spro zhe na kun du bzang po'i ste /
T02D2529:216a-5: dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdag po rnal 'byor pa kun
T02D2529:216a-6: du bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba mchog
T02D2529:216a-7: ste / 'di byang chub sems dpa' yin du zin
T02D2529:216a-8: kyang bya ba mchog ste sangs rgyas kyi bya ba
T02D2529:216a-9: rnams da lta nyid du byed pa ni de dang
T02D2529:216a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs mi 'chad par
T02D2529:216a-12: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs 'khor lo'i //
T02D2529:216a-13: dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes /
T02D2529:216a-15: khyod mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi'i dbus na
T02D2529:216a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad du gyur
T02D2529:216a-17: cing mdzes la gsal lo zhes bstod pa'o //
T02D2529:216a-18: de ltar na gsang sngags kyi lam 'dir ni de
T02D2529:216a-19: bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa la rjes su slob la
T02D2529:216a-20: / pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam du ni byang
T02D2529:216a-21: chub sems dpa' sa chen po la rab tu bzhugs
T02D2529:216a-22: pa dag gi rjes su slob cing /
T02D2529:216a-23: nyan thos rnams ni dgra bcom pa dag gi rjes su slob la /
T02D2529:216a-24: 'jig rten pa rnams ni khyab 'jug la sogs pa
T02D2529:216a-25: dag gi rjes su slob pas gong nas gong du
T02D2529:216a-27: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la zhugs
T02D2529:216a-28: te zhes bya ba ni khyod de tsam du bya
T02D2529:216a-29: ba don chen po la gnas pa la nged kyang
T02D2529:216a-30: phan 'dogs pas khyod kyi yid kyi byin gyis brlab
T02D2529:216a-32: de bzhin du khyod 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi khyod
T02D2529:216a-33: kyi 'khor dkyil 'khor du lhag par gnas par byas
T02D2529:216a-34: pa 'di dag kyang nged kyis byin gyis brlab bo
T02D2529:216a-35: zhes nas nges par 'thon nas sems ma rdo rje
T02D2529:216a-36: la sogs pa rnams dang gcig tu gyur te zhes
T02D2529:216a-37: smos so // de dag kyang cig car ram rim
T02D2529:216a-38: gyis rang rang gi gzugs kyis rang rang gi lha
T02D2529:216a-39: rnams la thim nas slar yang ched du rjod par
T02D2529:216a-40: smos so // byed pa ni / ae ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2529:216a-41: ae ma zhes pa ni sngon bzhin no //
T02D2529:216a-42: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:216a-43: rgya chen ni gzugs kyi sku ste gdod nas skye ba med pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02D2529:216a-44: de ltar na rgya che bas ni thams cad du khyab par nus la //
T02D2529:216b-0: @216b gdod ma nas ma skyes pa ni ngo bo
T02D2529:216b-1: nyid med pa'i phyir phan tshun thogs pa dang tha
T02D2529:216b-2: dad par zhen pa dang bral bas sangs rgyas gcig
T02D2529:216b-3: nyid thams cad kyi ngo bo yin te /
T02D2529:216b-4: thogs pa med pa'i sku can zhes pa'i don to //
T02D2529:216b-5: des na rdul phran bgrang ba gang yin pa'i sangs
T02D2529:216b-6: rgyas thams cad gcig tu bya'o zhes pa ni 'thad
T02D2529:216b-7: pa'o // de ltar rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug sems
T02D2529:216b-8: dpa' chen po kun du bzang po de sangs rgyas
T02D2529:216b-9: thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags la bkur bar byas
T02D2529:216b-10: pas lhag par mos par bstan par byas nas dpe
T02D2529:216b-11: med pa'i thabs mkhas pas yang slar tha dad pa'i
T02D2529:216b-12: lus la gnas pas lus kyi bya ba la 'jug
T02D2529:216b-13: pa'o // pa'i phyir / de nas dpal rdo rje
T02D2529:216b-14: sems dpa'i gnas na gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas zhes
T02D2529:216b-16: 'dir gang zhig gang gis zlos pa po yin yang rung ste /
T02D2529:216b-17: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' dang tha mi dad par
T02D2529:216b-18: bya ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka
T02D2529:216b-19: nas 'thon la de'i gnas su bsdad ces pa'o //
T02D2529:216b-20: der gnas nas ci zhig byed ce na /
T02D2529:216b-21: de'i phyir phreng ba'i dbang la sogs pa blangs la zhes smos te /
T02D2529:216b-22: dkyil 'khor du zhugs la mig phye ste /
T02D2529:216b-23: phreng ba dor la de blangs te spyi bor gdags
T02D2529:216b-24: pas dbang bskur nas dbang lhag ma lnga dang rdo
T02D2529:216b-25: rje brtul zhugs blang ba sngon bzhin bya zhes bya
T02D2529:216b-26: ba'i don to // ci de tsam du zad dam zhe na /
T02D2529:216b-27: de'i phyir rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug
T02D2529:216b-28: pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la rnam
T02D2529:216b-29: par snang mdzad la sogs pa phyag rgya bzhis rgyas
T02D2529:216b-30: gdab pa bya ste zhes bya ba smos te /
T02D2529:216b-31: snga ma ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bsdu bas spyir bya ba yin la /
T02D2529:216b-32: 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa ni rang gi dkyil
T02D2529:216b-33: 'khor ba nyi tshe la cho ga thun mong ma
T02D2529:216b-34: yin pa'o // 'o na bye brag ni spyir 'dus
T02D2529:216b-35: pas snga ma'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D2529:216b-36: thams cad bsdus pa'i khongs su rang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D2529:216b-37: pa yang 'dus pa ma yin nam /
T02D2529:216b-38: de bzhin du rigs pa snga mas lha thams cad bdag nyid gcig mod ce na /
T02D2529:216b-39: rang bzhin la ni lta gcig kho na'i bya bas
T02D2529:216b-40: lha thams cad kyi bya bar 'gyur bas na phyag
T02D2529:217a-2: 'on kyang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rnal 'byor 'di lta
T02D2529:217a-3: bu ni shin tu spro ba la dga' ba'i gang
T02D2529:217a-4: zag gi ngor byas shing yang dang yang du ting
T02D2529:217a-5: nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pas rnal
T02D2529:217a-6: 'byor sems sbyangs pa ni 'di la yang nyes pas
T02D2529:217a-7: 'dir dogs pa bskyed par mi bya'o //
T02D2529:217a-8: de la rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i bya
T02D2529:217a-9: ba dang phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab pa ni snga
T02D2529:217a-10: phyir zhib tu dpyad pas 'dir bdag gis kyang brjod
T02D2529:217a-11: mi dgos so // de ltar las byed pa po rnams kyi tshul rgyas par bstan nas /
T02D2529:217a-12: da ni ji lta ba la gzhag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2529:217a-13: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba dang //
T02D2529:217a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2529:217a-15: de la rnam par snang mdzad ni dang po mngon
T02D2529:217a-16: par rdzogs par byang chub ma thag tu lus la
T02D2529:217a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug pas rdo rje'i
T02D2529:217a-18: dbyings su gyur pas de sangs rgyas thams cad gcig
T02D2529:217a-19: tu bsdus pa'o // mi bskyod pa la sogs pa
T02D2529:217a-20: yang sngar sangs rgyas thams cad du mos pas phyogs
T02D2529:217a-21: bzhir bzhugs zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas gcig
T02D2529:217a-23: mdor bsdu na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab
T02D2529:217a-24: 'byams thams cad du gang na mngon par byang chub
T02D2529:217a-25: pa lnga'i rim pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus 'dul
T02D2529:217a-26: ba de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa 'di lnga
T02D2529:217a-27: gshegs te / lnga mngon par byang chub pa bstan
T02D2529:217a-28: nas de'i rjes su 'gro ba'i ris mang po 'jug
T02D2529:217a-29: par mdzad ces pa'i don to //
T02D2529:217a-30: rigs thams cad rgyas gdab pa dang zhes bya ba la rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te ;
T02D2529:217a-31: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //
T02D2529:217a-32: 'di thams cad kyang yin la rigs kyang yin pas na rigs thams cad do //
T02D2529:217a-33: de dag la rgyas gdab pa ni sems ma rdo
T02D2529:217a-34: rje ma la sogs pas dpral ba'i steng la sogs
T02D2529:217a-35: par rgyas btab pas sngar bstan pa ltar rigs lnga'i
T02D2529:217a-36: dbu rgyan grub par bya ba ste /
T02D2529:217a-37: ji skad du rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kha cig las /
T02D2529:217a-38: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab cing //
T02D2529:217a-39: 'bras bu la yang rgyus rgyas btab //
T02D2529:217a-40: gzhan du bskal pa bye bar yang //
T02D2529:217b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams la @217b 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo //
T02D2529:217b-1: de yang bu'i rgyan mas 'dogs pa ltar rigs kyi
T02D2529:217b-2: yum rnams kyis rgyas 'debs pa'i byed pa por bya'o
T02D2529:217b-3: // de ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras su byin
T02D2529:217b-4: gyis brlabs pas sems dpa' rnams lhag par mthu dang
T02D2529:217b-6: de bzhin du 'bras bu'i ngo bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang rgyu ste /
T02D2529:217b-7: rin chen rdo rje ma rin po che'i dbu rgyan
T02D2529:217b-8: du gnas par byas nas 'khor rnams la lhag par
T02D2529:217b-9: skyong ba'i mtshan mas rgyal por rung bar mtshan pa'o
T02D2529:217b-10: // de ltar na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T02D2529:217b-11: rnams su sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa
T02D2529:217b-12: 'phros te gang na rnal 'byor pa rigs de dang
T02D2529:217b-13: de la rgyas gdab par 'os pa de dag la
T02D2529:217b-15: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang //
T02D2529:217b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D2529:217b-17: dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer bskyang ba zhes bya
T02D2529:217b-18: ba ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs
T02D2529:217b-19: pa'i dbang du byas pa ste /
T02D2529:217b-20: de dag ni gang na dkyil 'khor chen po yod
T02D2529:217b-21: pa der sngon gyi smon lam dang dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D2529:217b-22: bdag po'i mthu dang sngon gyi dam tshig gis nges
T02D2529:217b-24: de dag la dmigs kyis bkar ba'i spyan drang ba med kyang 'dus par lhag par mos par bya'o //

T02D2529:224a-40: rang gi dam tshig mi zad bde bskyed bsten par byos //
T02D2529:224a-41: de ring 'gro ba la bde rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
T02D2529:224a-42: rab tu mnyam zhing rtag pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur //
T02D2529:224a-44: de ltar na ni ji ltar nus pas dam tshig
T02D2529:224a-45: thams cad phan tshun ldan par bsrung bar bya ba
T02D2529:224a-46: yin yang / khyad par du dbugs dbyung ba dang
T02D2529:224a-47: lhan cig bstan pa'i dam tshig 'di dag ni sgrub
T02D2529:224b-0: pa po'i dbang @224b du byas pa'o //
T02D2529:224b-1: gzhan dag ni dbugs dbyung ba slob dpon du dbang bskur ba la yang sbyin zhing /
T02D2529:224b-2: smos pa dang ma smos pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba
T02D2529:224b-3: dag las ma smos pa ni sgrub pa po'i dam
T02D2529:224b-4: tshig ste smos pa rnams ni slob dpon gyi sa'o
T02D2529:224b-5: zhes zer ro // sgrub pa po ni de dag mi bsrung ba ma yin mod kyi ;
T02D2529:224b-6: slob dpon gyis kyang gnyi ga la dgag pa mi sbyar ro //
T02D2529:224b-9: sgrub pa po tshad med pa'i dngos grub mthong ba'i
T02D2529:224b-10: tshe la thob par 'dod pa'i lha la sogs kyang
T02D2529:224b-12: yang 'dir gzhan dag ni cho ga 'di'i mthar ;
T02D2529:224b-13: de nas bsangs te slob ma yin //
T02D2529:224b-14: snying gar nye bar gtugs nas ni //
T02D2529:224b-15: kun byed rigs kyi rig pa bzlas //
T02D2529:224b-16: srung skud lag pa g-yas par gdags //
T02D2529:224b-17: de nas bla ma bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2529:224b-18: de yi spyi por gdugs kyang gzung //
T02D2529:224b-19: thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni //
T02D2529:224b-20: dkyil 'khor legs par bskor du gzhug / gdugs dang bcas pa'i sgo phyogs su //
T02D2529:224b-21: spyi bo 'dud de phyag 'tshal gzhug / slob ma 'di ni phul ba lags //
T02D2529:224b-23: bla mas de skad smras nas su //
T02D2529:224b-24: gdugs bzhag nas ni bla ma de //
T02D2529:224b-25: lag pas legs par bslang bar bya //
T02D2529:224b-28: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D2529:224b-29: lha rnams kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur //
T02D2529:224b-30: sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir //
T02D2529:224b-31: khyod kyis dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin//
T02D2529:224b-32: nan tan bskyed de bri bar bya //
T02D2529:224b-33: sgrub pa po yang rgyud la sbyor //
T02D2529:224b-34: zhes bya ba'i rgyud thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2529:224b-35: cho ga gsang ba spyi'i rgyud ces bya ba las
T02D2529:224b-36: gsungs pas kyang 'dir cho ga ma rdzogs pa rdzogs
T02D2529:224b-38: gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen por byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
T02D2529:224b-39: de slar gtong zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
T02D2529:224b-40: su 'dun pas myur du 'dod chags dang bral bar
T02D2529:224b-41: byed na / byang chub kyi sems btang ba dang
T02D2529:224b-42: bla ma bslus pa'i phyir sdig pa mtha' med pas
T02D2529:224b-43: byed na / na / 'dod chags bral ba lta
T02D2529:224b-44: bu'i sdig / ces bya ba la sogs pa smos
T02D2529:225a-1: thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo las byang chub kyi sems btang na rtsa ba'i ltung bar bstan pa dang /
T02D2529:225a-3: mi gang byang chub sems btang yang //
T02D2529:225a-4: de dag thar par mdzad pa ni //
T02D2529:225a-5: las tshul bsam gyis mi khyab phyir //
T02D2529:225a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa kho nas mkhyen ;
T02D2529:225a-8: de'i phyir gsang sngags kyi lam 'dir byang chub kyi
T02D2529:225a-9: sems mi gtang bar bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D2529:225a-10: gtso bo ste sngar rgyas par brjod pa bzhin no
T02D2529:225a-11: // yang dag par tshim par bya ba ni sgrub
T02D2529:225a-12: pa po ma yin gyi slob ma gang dag zas
T02D2529:225a-13: la sred pas der 'dus pa la sogs pa'o ;
T02D2529:225a-14: / h'um bzhi pa ni aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags so //
T02D2529:225a-15: gzugs brnyan ni dbang po la sogs pa'i'o //
T02D2529:225a-16: sbyin sreg mang zhing smos pa ni de'i cho ga
T02D2529:225a-17: slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas dang gzhan gyis kyang
T02D2529:225a-18: gzhan du zhib tu dpyad pas chog go //
T02D2529:225a-19: snying gar byug pa ni bsrung ba'i don to //
T02D2529:225a-20: gzhan dag ni slob ma dang bcug par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T02D2529:225a-21: de ltar don mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas /
T02D2529:225a-22: da ni rdo rje sems zhes bya ba la sogs pas dge ba bsngo ba mdzad pa ste /
T02D2529:225a-23: dngos grub thams cad ni 'jig rten dang de las 'das pa'o ;
T02D2529:225a-24: / rigs pa'i mchog ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes te de nyid ni /
T02D2529:225a-25: sems can kun gyi gnyen gcig po //
T02D2529:225a-27: gzhan la de tsam du phan pa dang bde ba
T02D2529:225a-28: bya bar sems pa med pas ma dang pha las
T02D2529:225a-29: kyang lhag pa'o // der kun dga' snying po bdag gyur cig ces sbyar ro //
T02D2529:225a-30: de bzhin du sems can ma lus pa yang khyab
T02D2529:225a-31: bdag rdo rje 'chang chen du gyur cig ces bya
T02D2529:225a-32: ba'i don to // dkyil 'cho ga rgya chen 'di //
T02D2529:225a-33: go rims log par smra ba dag / bsal phyir go rims ji bzhin brjod //
T02D2529:225a-34: de bzhin tshig don nyung zad bris //
T02D2529:225a-35: 'di las skyes pa'i dge ba yis //
T02D2529:225a-36: 'gro ba sangs rgyas gnas 'gro shog /'phags pa de
T02D2529:225a-37: kho na nyid bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga
T02D2529:225a-38: rdo rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i bsdus pa'i don
T02D2529:225a-39: a'a ts'arya mu n'i na dra bha dras mdzad pa
T02D2529:225a-41: / a'a ts'arya mu n'i na dra bha dra dang /
T02D2529:225b-0: bod kyi @225b lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi
